courseDetails.title: Executive Certificate in Digital Transformation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Principles and Foundations of Digital Transformation in Business and Specific Domains
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Executive Certificate in Digital Transformation


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 210 countries and has been chosen by more than 520 000 students.


Course Author:

Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.



The Executive Certificate in Digital Transformation offered by MTF Institute of Management, Technology & Finance is a comprehensive program designed to equip executives and managers with the knowledge and skills needed to lead successful digital transformations within their organizations. In business landscape, digital transformation has become a critical strategic imperative for companies across all industries. This program aims to provide participants with a deep understanding of digital technologies, their impact on businesses, and effective strategies for leveraging them to drive growth and innovation.


Importance of Education in Digital Transformation for Companies and Managers:

In the  business environment, digital transformation has emerged as a key driver of competitive advantage and long-term success. Embracing digital technologies is no longer an option but a necessity for companies to remain relevant and thrive. However, implementing digital transformation initiatives requires more than just adopting new tools; it demands a comprehensive understanding of digital trends, customer behavior, data analytics, and organizational change management. This education helps companies and managers:


Strategic Adaptation: Digital transformation education empowers organizations to align their strategies with the opportunities and challenges presented by the digital age. It helps leaders identify potential areas for disruption and develop agile responses to stay ahead of the competition.


Enhanced Customer Experience: Understanding digital transformation enables businesses to design and deliver exceptional customer experiences, which are crucial for customer retention and loyalty in today's customer-centric market.


Data-Driven Decision Making: The course equips managers with skills in data analysis and interpretation, enabling them to make data-driven decisions that lead to improved business outcomes.


Innovation and Creativity: Participants will learn about emerging technologies and innovation processes, fostering a culture of creativity within their organizations and driving continuous improvement.


Organizational Resilience: With digital transformation education, managers can build resilient organizations capable of adapting to disruptions and thriving in times of uncertainty.


Importance of Digital Transformation Education for Building a Career:

In the competitive job market, professionals with expertise in digital transformation are in high demand across various industries. Building a career with a strong foundation in digital transformation can open up numerous opportunities for individuals:


Competitive Advantage: Having a recognized qualification in digital transformation sets job seekers apart from others in the job market, giving them a competitive edge when applying for leadership positions.


Career Progression: As companies prioritize digital transformation to remain competitive, they seek managers and leaders with expertise in this area. Earning an executive diploma in digital transformation can lead to career advancement and promotion.


Versatility: Digital transformation knowledge is valuable across industries, allowing professionals to explore diverse career paths and contribute to different sectors.


High-impact Roles: Graduates can secure roles that involve leading digital transformation initiatives, making strategic decisions, and driving organizational change, thereby playing a crucial role in shaping their company's future.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Short Diploma in Retail Management & Merchandising
courseDetails.shortDescription: Retail Management | Retailing | Retail Pricing | Merchandising | Retail Business | Consumer Strategy
courseDetails.longDescription:
Competent retail managers do more than run stores; they also manage teams and inventory and analyze sales patterns. Are you passionate about becoming one?

Here you go with our exclusive Short Diploma in Retail Management & Mechandising course. We have designed this course with all the relevant knowledge you need to start your career in retail management.

We will start our course with an introductory module to introduce you to the basic concepts, which will strengthen your base for starting your career in retail management. Along with its career prospects, we will define the concepts of retailing and retail management. Besides, we will help you assess the current trends in retail management so you can update your retail management strategy accordingly with a changing pattern.

As you progress with our course, you will gain all relevant knowledge to execute your operation in retail management, including retail strategy and planning based on situation analysis, identifying potential consumers, and making a foolproof strategy based on the analysis.

Furthermore, we will discuss and guide you in retail pricing and merchandising, which greatly influence the profit of your retail business. In that context, we will discuss pricing elasticity; understanding this topic will help you figure out consumer perception and set a price to give you back the maximum profit. Moreover, you will learn how to calculate markup and margins in retail management, which are key factors in business profitability and success.

Start your journey with our Retail Management 101 course and showcase your potential in retailing.

Enroll Now!

This course comes with the following Sections:

  1. Introduction to Retail Management: This section will discuss the fundamentals of retail management. You will understand what retailing is and the importance of staying up to date with retail business trends and job prospects in retail management.

  2. Retail Strategy and Planning: In this part of our retail management course, we will teach you how to plan out a practical strategy to maximize the output of your retail business.

  3. Retail Pricing and Merchandising: This section examines the basics of retail pricing and merchandising, including how retailers decide price strategies, calculate markup and profits, use promotional pricing to attract customers, and lots more.
targetAudiences: Anyone interested in Retail Management
Store Manager
Merchandising Manager
Merchandising Manager
Marketing Manager
people starting their career in  Retail Management

courseDetails.title: The Complete Matlab Course for Wireless Comm. Engineering
courseDetails.shortDescription: A step by step the Matlab codes for BER/CFO/PAPR estimations of different Comm. systems like OFDM and NOMA Comm. systems
courseDetails.longDescription:
This is course is designed for under and postgraduate students associated to the electronics and communication engineering department. It has 31 introductions , each introduction discusses the theoretical explanation and the simulated figures that obtained through the explanation of the course. This course saves many months of hard work.

Using the Matlab program, you will learn:

1-How to estimate the Bit-Error-Rate (BER) performance over a Single-Input-Single-Output Orthogonal Frequency Division Multiplexing (SISO-OFDM) communication system based on Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) over an Additive White Gaussian Noise (AWGN) channel using different mapping schemes?

2-How to generate a Rayleigh fading channel based on the Jakes fading model?

3-How to estimate the BER performance over a SISO-OFDM communication system based on FFT over a Rayleigh fading channel without equalization procedure?

4-How to estimate the BER performance over a SISO-OFDM communication system based on FFT over a Rayleigh fading channel with equalization procedure?

5-Study the Effect of the Carrier Frequency Offset (CFO) problem.

6-How to estimate the Mean Square Error (MSE) performance for CFO estimation of OFDM communication system based on FFT Using Cyclic Prefix (CP) symmetry property over an AWGN channel and Rayleigh fading channel?

7-How to estimate the BER performance over a SISO-OFDM communication system based on Discrete Sine Transform (DST) over an AWGN channel using different mapping schemes?

8-How to estimate the BER performance over a SISO-OFDM communication system based on DST over a Rayleigh fading channel using different equalizers?

9-How to estimate the BER performance over a SISO-OFDM communication system based on Discrete Cosine Transform (DCT) over an AWGN channel using different mapping schemes?

10-How to estimate the BER performance over a SISO-OFDM communication system based on DCT over a Rayleigh fading channel using different equalizers?

11-How to estimate the Peak-to-Average Power Ratio (PAPR) for OFDM communication system based on FFT?

12-How to estimate the PAPR for OFDM communication system based on DST?

13-How to estimate the PAPR for OFDM communication system based on DCT?

14-Proposal of a general code for BER estimation in case of a Nt×Nr configuration for OFDM communication system based on FFT/DST/DCT over a Rayleigh fading channel will be presented.

15-How to estimate the BER performance for a FFT/DST/DCT pre-coded downlink NOMA based on FFT-OFDM communication system using localized/interleaved sub-carrier mapping over a Rayleigh fading channel?

16-How to estimate the BER performance for a DST/DCT pre-coded downlink NOMA based on DST/DCT-OFDM communication system, respectively using localized/interleaved sub-carrier mapping over a Rayleigh fading channel?

17-How to estimate the PAPR for a FFT/DST/DCT pre-coded NOMA based on FFT-OFDM communication system using localized/interleaved sub-carrier mapping?

18-How to estimate the PAPR for a DST/DCT pre-coded NOMA based on DST/DCT-OFDM communication system, respectively using localized/interleaved sub-carrier mapping?
targetAudiences: This is course is designed for under and postgraduate students associated with the electronics and communication engineering department

What is Marketing?

  • Definition: Marketing is the process of identifying customer needs, creating products or services that fulfill those needs, and communicating the value of those offerings to potential customers.

  • Focus: Marketing focuses on getting the right message to the right audience, ultimately driving interest and sales.

  • Key Activities:

    • Market research

    • Product development

    • Brand building

    • Advertising and promotions

    • Content creation

    • Customer relationship management


What is Marketing Management?

  • Definition: Marketing management is the strategic and operational process of planning, organizing, implementing, and controlling an organization's marketing resources and activities.

  • Focus: Marketing management aims to create a cohesive marketing plan, optimize resource allocation, and measure the effectiveness of marketing initiatives.

  • Key Activities:

    • Developing marketing strategies and plans

    • Setting marketing budgets

    • Managing marketing teams

    • Overseeing marketing campaigns

    • Analyzing marketing performance (tracking metrics and ROI)

    • Making adjustments to strategies as needed


The Relationship Between Marketing and Marketing Management

Think of marketing as the actions you take to promote your business, and marketing management as the overarching system to plan, execute, and refine those actions strategically.


Here's a simple analogy:

  • Marketing is like cooking a delicious meal. It involves finding the right recipe (products/services), sourcing the best ingredients (market research), and carefully preparing the dish (advertising, promotions).

  • Marketing Management is like being the head chef. They devise the overall menu (marketing strategy), manage the kitchen staff (marketing teams), ensure the budget is efficient, and keep track of customer feedback (measuring results) to perfect future meals.

Customer experience (CX) is the overall impression customers have of your brand throughout their interactions with your business. It encompasses everything from the initial marketing message to the post-purchase support they receive. Think of it as the customer journey, and CX is all the touchpoints along the way that shape their perception.


Key Areas of CX

  • Customer touchpoints: Every interaction a customer has with your brand, like websites, social media, advertising, in-store experience, and customer service.

  • Customer journey: Mapping out the steps a customer takes to interact with your brand, from awareness to purchase and beyond.

  • Customer satisfaction: How happy customers are with your product or service.

  • Customer loyalty: How likely customers are to return and recommend your brand to others.


CX Frameworks

Frameworks provide a structured approach to improving CX. Here are two common ones:

  • Customer Experience Journey Map: A visual representation of the customer journey, identifying touchpoints and opportunities for improvement.

  • Five Service Dimensions: A framework that focuses on five key aspects of service quality: reliability, responsiveness, assurance, empathy, and tangibles.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Companies:

  1. Improved Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: CXM focuses on understanding and meeting customer needs, leading to increased satisfaction and a higher likelihood of repeat business.

  2. Enhanced Brand Reputation: Positive customer experiences contribute to a strong brand reputation, attracting new customers and retaining existing ones.

  3. Increased Revenue and Profitability: Satisfied customers are more likely to spend more, refer others, and remain loyal, all of which contribute to revenue growth.

  4. Competitive Advantage: In today's crowded marketplace, exceptional customer experience can be a key differentiator, setting a company apart from its competitors.

  5. Reduced Costs: Resolving customer issues proactively and efficiently can reduce the cost of customer service and support.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Building a Career as a Manager:

  1. In-demand Skill: CXM is a highly sought-after skill in today's business world, as companies increasingly recognize its importance.

  2. Career Advancement: Expertise in CXM can open doors to various managerial roles, such as Customer Experience Manager, Customer Success Manager, or Marketing Manager.

  3. Problem-solving Skills: CXM involves identifying and addressing customer pain points, which enhances problem-solving and analytical skills.

  4. Leadership Development: Managing customer experience initiatives requires strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.

  5. Cross-functional Collaboration: CXM often involves working with multiple departments, providing managers with exposure to different areas of the business.


Overall, learning CXM is crucial for companies looking to thrive in the modern business landscape. It's also a valuable investment for managers aiming to build a successful career in various industries.

courseDetails.title: Gratitude
courseDetails.shortDescription: The life transforming power of Gratitude
courseDetails.longDescription:
Gratitude, the attitude that sometimes seem counter-intuitive, especially when we look around and find no reason to engage in it.

It is defined as the quality of being thankful; readiness to show appreciation for and to return kindness.

Beyond that, it is a quality or trait that you can express by reflection, self and for the people, things and circumstances around you.

It has a few powerful side effects. Some include:

- A change in perspective

- Uplifting ones mood

- Creating a suitable environment, at least within ones mind, that facilitates good decision making   


Gratitude for what, many ask?

Gratitude for Health, Sleep, Food, Body, Mind, Wellbeing, Peace of Mind, Finances, a job, career, income, roof over ones head, ability to earn, appreciate the way the world works and make a living out of it.

Gratitude for interactions, relationships with those around us, our families, children, parents, friends, colleagues, associates.

Gratitude for our professional situations, abilities, opportunities, overcoming challenges and much more.


To build this perspective into ones life is a gift one should bestow on ones self. It helps open up new perspectives at all times.

It also has immense benefits for your health - mentally, physically, emotionally. IT helps with better sleep, better self esteem, improved moods and much more.


The opportunities we have in this one life will be amplified and optimised by a quality such as Gratitude in our lives.


Gratitude to people also help forge better relations. It does not mean we should cease to have our own minds or always defer to what the people we are grateful to want, but it should be demonstrated genuinely, from the heart at every deserving opportunity. It is a privilege to have others support, care and help us.

We ourselves would do well to seek out people to support, care for and help. Not in search of gratitude or having them in our debt, but to show how grateful we are for the things that have come our way, without expecting anything from anyone in return.


Lastly, Gratitude to who?


Whoever you decide or However or Whatever you decide to show Gratitude to in your own way.


Thanks for stopping over on this course and I hope it will contribute to your life in some way.


I am grateful for the privilege to be able to reach you.


Please, remember to reach out and or leave a feedback.


Best regards,

Baba
targetAudiences: Everyone
Students
Professionals
Managers
Leaders
Decision Makers
Adults
Young People

courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UN BLOG PERSONAL O PARA TU NEGOCIO CON LA AYUDA DE LA INTELIGENCIA ARTIFICIAL?


Crear un blog con Inteligencia Artificial hace que todo sea más fácil y te ahorra tiempo y esfuerzo, que puedes utilizar para tareas más importantes. Si tu presupuesto no es muy alto, crear un blog con IA te ayuda a ahorrar dinero. Es más económico que contratar un desarrollador web.


¿CÓMO FUNCIONA LA PLATAFORMA DE WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.

Cuando termines de crear y personalizar tu blog, puedes publicarlo en Internet.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su blog con Inteligencia Artificial, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su blog diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.


¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tu blog con Inteligencia Artificial.

  • Cómo crear blogs profesionales desde cero con la ayuda de la Inteligencia Artificial.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu blog de forma profesional.

  • Cómo crear el contenido de tu blog con la ayuda de la Inteligencia Artificial.

  • Cómo crear artículos para tu blog con la ayuda de la Inteligencia Artificial.

  • Cómo crear un formulario de contacto para tu blog.

  • Cómo adaptar tu blog para dispositivos móviles (tablets y celulares).


¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear un Blog con Inteligencia Artificial", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 180,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear un blog con Inteligencia Artificial de forma rápida y sencilla.


¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay herramientas interesantes, atractivas y nuevas que aprender con WordPress y la Inteligencia Artificial.

Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS DE FORMA RÁPIDA Y SENCILLA?


En este curso te voy a hablar del servicio conocido como Elementor Hosting, te voy a mostrar lo fácil que es crear una página web profesional con uno de los mejores plugins para WordPress, conocido como Elementor, el cual tiene más de 15 millones de instalaciones activas en WordPress, es un gran constructor visual, uno de los más fáciles de usar con tan solo arrastrar y soltar elementos, puedes tener un sitio web prácticamente creado en minutos.


¿QUÉ ES ELEMENTOR HOSTING?


La empresa de Elementor te ofrece una solución completa, la cuál no solo te incluye el servicio de hosting, sino también incluye de forma pre instalada la plataforma de WordPress, al igual que también incluye la versión de Elementor Pro, entre todos los beneficios que incluye este servicio en su plan básico, también obtienes 10 gigas de almacenamiento de disco duro, 30 gigas de ancho de banda por mes, lo cuál te permite recibir hasta 25.000 visitas mensuales.

Si aún no puedes adquirir un dominio en este momento, puedes crear tu sitio web sobre un subdominio gratuito bajo Elementor Hosting, en donde puedes empezar de inmediato, incluye también copias de seguridad diarias, un certificado SSL gratuito de Cloudflare y migración gratuita de tu sitio web, todo esto en un mismo plan y con un simple pago anual.

Elementor Hosting es un alojamiento de WordPress administrado con tecnología de la plataforma de Google Cloud, plataforma en la que confían miles de empresas de primer nivel gracias a su seguridad y confiabilidad de clase mundial.

Con Elementor Hosting tienes también integrado Cloudflare, el servicio más reconocido de Red de Distribución de Contenido, el cual utiliza servidores distribuidos en todo el mundo para que tus visitantes sean dirigidos automáticamente a tu sitio web, de acuerdo al servidor más cercano, permitiéndote que tu sitio web cargue mucho más rápido.

Elementor Hosting también ofrece una herramienta de almacenamiento en caché integrada para aumentar aún más la velocidad de carga y le brinda la opción de ajustar aún más el almacenamiento en caché de tu sitio web con plugins de optimización.

Adicionalmente, Elementor Hosting también te ofrece varias opciones de seguridad como protección de DOS y WAF bloqueo de sitio y monitoreo las 24 horas del día, los 7 días de la semana.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un sitio web con WordPress, también utilizaremos la plataforma de Elementor Hosting que nos brindará el apoyo y la arquitectura necesaria para diseñar nuestro sitio web en WordPress, que llevarán su diseño web al siguiente nivel.


Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su sitio web con WordPress y Elementor Hosting, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUIERES CREAR UNA PÁGINA DE VENTAS PARA HOTMART Y AUMENTAR TUS INGRESOS POR MARKETING DE AFILIACIÓN?


Hotmart es una plataforma de venta de cursos modelo Marketplace, fundada en 2011. Con más de 7 millones de usuarios en todo el mundo y transacciones que superan los mil millones de dólares anuales. Se ha consolidado como el líder en ventas de infoproductos en Latinoamérica y mundialmente solo detrás de Udemy.


Actualmente Hotmart tiene más de 420,000 infoproductos registrados, más de 30 millones de usuarios registrados y presencia en más de 190 países.

Esta plataforma consigue ganar dinero a través del cobro por comisiones por la venta de cada curso.


La principal diferencia de Hotmart respecto a otras plataformas para venta de cursos modelo MarketPlace, es que Hotmart cuenta con una estructura un poco más compleja, y tiene más variables en juego, siendo la más relevante y diferencial «el afiliado».

El afiliado se encarga de promocionar y vender los infoproductos de Hotmart, solucionando así uno de los principales problemas de los creadores de contenidos, así es hablamos de las ventas.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.

El creador con IA escribirá el contenido, utilizará imágenes libres de derecho y elegirá los colores y tipografías adecuados para ti, según tu descripción.

Una vez se genera tu sitio, puedes personalizarlo aún más con el editor de arrastrar y soltar. Modifica y agrega imágenes, videos, botones, textos y más.

courseDetails.title: Diploma Executivo em Liderança
courseDetails.shortDescription: Diploma Executivo em Liderança
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Diploma Executivo em Liderança


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática ("Machine Learning"), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico, e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, membro da Câmara Portuguesa de Comércio e Indústria.

O MTF está presente em 208 países e foi escolhido por mais de 420 000 alunos.


Autor do curso:

O Dr. Pedro Nunes construiu uma carreira multifacetada, combinando com sucesso o mundo académico com a experiência prática no mundo dos negócios. A sua formação culminou com um Doutoramento em Análise Económica e Estratégia Empresarial, com menção "cum laude", pela Universidade de Santiago de Compostela.

Profissionalmente, o Dr. Nunes navegou por diversos setores, incluindo tecnologia, comércio internacional e consultoria, desempenhando funções que vão desde analista de negócios até diretor. Atualmente, aplica a sua vasta experiência na indústria e os seus conhecimentos académicos como Professor em vários programas de DBA, contribuindo para a formação da próxima geração de profissionais.


LIDERANÇA:


Definição geral: A liderança pode ser vista como a arte de motivar um grupo de pessoas a atingir um objetivo comum. Implica não só a gestão de recursos, mas também inspirar e moldar o futuro das organizações.


Âmbito:  A aula abordará os aspectos fundamentais da liderança, incluindo a sua definição, significado e as várias abordagens teóricas que têm sido desenvolvidas ao longo do tempo.


Relevância moderna: A liderança é fundamentalmente uma questão de influência. Envolve a capacidade de um indivíduo para inspirar, motivar e permitir que outros contribuam para a eficácia e o sucesso da organização.


Desafios: No atual ambiente em rápida mudança, marcado pela globalização, avanços tecnológicos e desafios éticos complexos, a liderança torna-se cada vez mais crítica.


A IMPORTÂNCIA DA LIDERANÇA NAS ORGANIZAÇÕES:


Adaptação e mudança: Os líderes eficazes são essenciais para navegar através de mudanças e incertezas, orientando as organizações através de processos de transformação e adaptando-se a novos paradigmas.


Cultura e ética organizacional: Os líderes desempenham um papel crucial na formação da cultura organizacional e na promoção de um clima ético, influenciando o comportamento dos empregados e o ethos organizacional geral.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Gestão

O nosso objetivo é proporcionar-lhe uma compreensão sistemática dos desafios e considerações éticas que os líderes de hoje enfrentam em vários contextos organizacionais. Começamos por definir o que a liderança realmente implica - não se trata apenas de gerir, mas de inspirar e influenciar os outros para atingir um objetivo comum. Iremos aprofundar várias teorias de liderança. Através de uma mistura de conhecimentos teóricos e estudos de casos práticos, veremos como uma liderança eficaz é crucial para orientar a mudança, moldar a cultura organizacional e defender a ética e a responsabilidade social
Objetivo: Proporcionar uma compreensão sistemática dos desafios que os gestores contemporâneos enfrentam, centrando-se na ética e nas melhores práticas de liderança nas organizações actuais.
Âmbito: A aula abordará os aspectos fundamentais da liderança, incluindo a sua definição, significado e as várias abordagens teóricas que têm sido desenvolvidas ao longo do tempo.

courseDetails.title: Modélisation financière : cours complet de finance sur Excel
courseDetails.shortDescription: Cas pratique de modélisation financière sur Excel – Business Plan, valorisation et modélisation financière sur Excel
courseDetails.longDescription:
Si vous êtes intéressé par les métiers de la finance que ce soit le Private Equity, le M&A ou encore le contrôle de gestion ou la direction financière. Vous avez dû vous en rendre compte. Il y a une compétence clé à maîtriser dans l'ensemble de ces métiers de la finance, C’est la modélisation financière.

La modélisation financière est fondamentale en finance car elle constitue le socle de nombreuses missions essentielles telles que l'élaboration de Business Plans, la réalisation de reportings sur Excel, et la valorisation d'entreprises. La capacité à créer des modèles financiers fiables et structurés est donc cruciale si vous envisagez une carrière en finance d'entreprise.

C'est pourquoi de nombreux entretiens incluent des cas techniques sur Excel. En 30 minutes à une heure, on peut ainsi effectuer une sélection rigoureuse parmi les candidats. En leur fournissant un ordinateur et des consignes précises, on peut identifier et retenir les 10% de candidats les plus compétents en modélisation financière.

Ce cours complet de finance sur Excel vous donnera les connaissances, les codes et les bonnes pratiques pour être en capacité de réaliser un modèle Excel clair, bien structuré et conforme aux attentes des banques d'investissement, des fonds de Private Equity, des directions financières et des équipes de contrôle de gestion.

Vous découvrirez dans cette formation les normes de modélisation financière et les règles à suivre pour aboutir à un rendu professionnel, rigoureux, optimisé et sans faute.

Vous apprendrez à concevoir un modèle financier complet avec plusieurs scénarios d’investissement et de développement d’une entreprise, un échéancier de dette comprenant plusieurs tranches de financement et présentant des caractéristiques différentes, un tableau Emploi Ressources et un Business Plan clair, une valorisation par la méthode des comparables transactionnels en se basant sur un EBITDA normatif. Enfin on aboutira au TRI que nous sensibiliserons en fonction des paramètres de sortie d’investissement.

Évidemment si vous n'êtes pas encore familier avec tous ces concepts, nous verrons à quoi ils renvoient avant d'entamer la modélisation financière sur Excel.

Ce cours revient sur des fondamentaux essentiels en finance et les connaissances indispensables à maîtriser avant de vous montrer étape par étape comment réaliser un modèle financier conforme aux attentes des équipes de contrôle de gestion, d'analyse financière ou des métiers de la transaction (fonds d’investissement, M&A, Transaction Services).


Présentation du formateur :

Je m’appelle Yassine, je suis le fondateur d’un organisme de formation en finance d’entreprise qui a accompagné des milliers d’étudiants et jeunes diplômés dans la préparation des entretiens en Private Equity, banque d’investissement et cabinet de conseil en Transaction Services, Valorisation et Restructuring financier.

Je suis également un ancien Associate en Private Equity puisque j’ai travaillé pendant 2 ans au sein de 2 fonds d’investissement différents à Paris sur des opérations small cap dans des secteurs variés comme l’hôtellerie et l’immobilier, la tech et les médias ou encore les énergies renouvelables.

J’ai également été consultant senior en Valorisation et modélisation financière chez EY. J’ai donc été amené à réaliser plusieurs modèles financiers dans des contextes transactionnels et de projets d’investissement.
targetAudiences: Etudiants en master finance intéressés par les métiers les plus sélectifs de la finance d'entreprise (Private Equity, Venture Capital, M&A, Leveraged Finance, ECM, Transaction Services, Restructuring, Valorisation et bien sûr modélisation financière)
Stagiaires en finance d'entreprise
Analystes débutants en corporate finance
Analystes seniors en finance cherchant à améliorer leurs compétences en modélisation financière sur Excel
Candidats aux entretiens en finance qui souhaitent pratiquer en prévision d'un cas de modélisation sur Excel

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT e IA Generativa: guía de IA y prompt engineering
courseDetails.shortDescription: Domina la IA y el Prompt engineering: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Copilot, Gemini | El curso esencial de IA generativa
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formación Integral en ChatGPT e IA Generativa

¿Te imaginas empezar cada día con un asistente personal sumamente talentoso, listo para ejecutar tus tareas con una precisión y rapidez insuperables?

Una IA que puede redactar tus correos, artículos o informes, crear imágenes inspiradoras, analizar datos complejos, programar soluciones a medida y resolver innumerables problemas, permitiéndote enfocarte en lo que realmente importa.

Para disfrutar de todos estos beneficios, primero hay que dominar la IA. Muchas personas se entusiasman, realizan un par de comandos y abandonan, sin llegar a descubrir el verdadero potencial de la inteligencia artificial. Este comportamiento suele deberse a la falta de conocimiento sobre las técnicas, métodos y configuraciones que permiten obtener los mejores resultados.

El objetivo de esta formación es proporcionarte todas las herramientas para comunicarte eficazmente con la IA, configurarla de la mejor manera y explotarla al máximo. Para lograrlo, he diseñado un curso conciso y dinámico que te permitirá desarrollar los conocimientos y habilidades esenciales para un uso óptimo de la IA.


Durante esta formación, aprenderás:

  • Formulación de solicitudes claras a la IA: Cómo redactar peticiones precisas para obtener las mejores respuestas posibles.

  • Configuración de ChatGPT: Convertir ChatGPT en tu profesor, cofundador o analista de confianza.

  • Generación de ideas y productividad: Técnicas para generar múltiples ideas y mejorar tu trabajo, aumentando tu productividad, velocidad, relevancia y eficacia.

  • Aprovechamiento de la multimodalidad de ChatGPT: Cómo escribirle, hablarle, escucharlo, enviarle imágenes y pedirle que las interprete.

  • Generación de imágenes con Dall-e y Copilot: Estrategias para obtener las mejores imágenes posibles.

  • Alternativas a la versión de pago de ChatGPT: Cómo encontrar y utilizar opciones interesantes.

  • Exploración de otras IA: Conocer y utilizar otras herramientas como Copilot, Claude o Gemini.

  • Adaptación de ChatGPT a tus necesidades: Personalizar ChatGPT según tus preferencias y necesidades específicas para obtener respuestas a medida.

  • Potenciación de ChatGPT con los GPTs: Uso de aplicaciones GPT y creación de estas, incluso sin ser desarrollador.

  • Temas técnicos avanzados: Gestión de API, uso del playground, e integración de ChatGPT en otros software como Excel o Google Sheets.

  • Accesibilidad para todos: Todo el contenido está diseñado para ser accesible, incluso para principiantes.


En esta formación, encontrarás:

  • Demostraciones concretas: Ejemplos prácticos y casos de uso.

  • Fichas técnicas y guías prácticas: Material descargable para facilitar tu aprendizaje.

[Actualización: He añadido videos sobre el uso del modelo GPT4o que sucede a la versión GPT4]

En resumen, estás a punto de iniciar un curso claro, accesible y atractivo. Está diseñado para cubrir los conceptos esenciales sin extenderse demasiado, ofreciendo el equilibrio perfecto. No importa tu nivel inicial, ya seas principiante o busques técnicas avanzadas, esta es la única formación que necesitarás para dominar ChatGPT.


Mi presentación:

Me llamo Yassine, soy el fundador de una organización de formación que ha ayudado a miles de estudiantes a alcanzar sus objetivos profesionales. Soy un apasionado de la tecnología. Después de obtener un máster en finanzas y adquirir experiencia en consultoría y fondos de inversión, me formé en desarrollo web y dediqué cientos de horas a descubrir y utilizar IA. Hoy quiero transmitirte, de la manera más clara posible, todo lo que he aprendido en estos últimos años.


Certificación y garantía:

  • Al completar esta formación, recibirás una certificación que podrás compartir en LinkedIn.

  • Esta formación es sin riesgo, ya que cuentas con una garantía de "satisfacción o reembolso" de 30 días.

  • Tendrás acceso de por vida a la formación y a los recursos descargables.

Estás a un clic de dominar una tecnología extremadamente útil que te hará más eficiente, más productivo y, simplemente, indispensable. ¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza tu viaje hacia la maestría en IA!



Detalle de las diferentes secciones de este curso:


Introducción rápida a ChatGPT

Descubre cómo dominar rápidamente ChatGPT en solo unos pocos videos. Sumérgete en su interfaz intuitiva y aprende a crear tus primeros comandos para aprovechar al máximo el poder de la IA. Ya sea para generar tablas, hacer lluvias de ideas, generar nuevas ideas, traducir y corregir textos, o redactar diversos contenidos, serás más rápido y eficiente con la IA. Descubre cómo ChatGPT puede asistirte en tu búsqueda de empleo y adaptarse a tus necesidades profesionales para aumentar tu eficacia. Verás que ChatGPT es capaz de crear una multitud de contenidos, desde correos y cartas hasta artículos y publicaciones para redes sociales, sin olvidar la redacción de código informático.

Fundamentos del prompt engineering

Aprende por qué el prompt engineering es esencial y cómo puede transformar a ChatGPT en un verdadero experto. Comprende la importancia del contexto y los objetivos para estructurar tus interacciones, y descubre cómo ajustar el formato y la temperatura para optimizar tus comandos y variar el nivel de creatividad del modelo. Personaliza tus interacciones dominando el tono y el estilo, y benefíciate de 5 consejos prácticos para obtener respuestas aún más pertinentes de ChatGPT.

Técnicas avanzadas de prompt engineering

En esta sección, veremos cómo crear comandos que generen otros comandos. Estudiaremos la metodología de reverse engineering, las funcionalidades de búsqueda web, la interpretación de imágenes y muchas otras técnicas avanzadas.

Dall-e

Continuaremos con la generación de imágenes con Dall-e. Verás cómo pasar de un resultado promedio a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, cómo modificar de manera simple y rápida porciones de imágenes y optimizar tus resultados. También estudiaremos técnicas avanzadas que te permitirán, por ejemplo, crear una continuidad en la generación de un personaje de ficción o cómic, para obtener resultados aún más impresionantes.

Soluciones a las limitaciones de ChatGPT y la IA

ChatGPT y otros modelos de inteligencia artificial tienen límites y debilidades. En esta sección, exploraremos cuáles son y cómo superarlas.

Funcionalidades interesantes en ChatGPT

Aprende a configurar las funcionalidades de compartir tus conversaciones para un uso colaborativo de ChatGPT. Aprovecha al máximo la aplicación móvil de ChatGPT explorando todas las opciones que ofrece. Finalmente, descubre métodos para crear contenido único con la IA evitando cualquier forma de plagio o contenido duplicado.

Copilot y Bing

Copilot ofrece varias alternativas interesantes a las funcionalidades avanzadas y de pago de ChatGPT. Veremos cómo aprovechar la colaboración entre Microsoft y OpenAI para acceder a funcionalidades avanzadas de inteligencia artificial integradas en el motor de búsqueda Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral y otros

En la continuidad de la sección anterior, estudiaremos otras IA como Gemini de Google o Claude de Anthropic. Veremos sus fortalezas, debilidades y analizaremos varios casos de uso para saber en qué situaciones es preferible utilizarlas en lugar de ChatGPT.

Instrucciones personalizadas en ChatGPT

Adapta ChatGPT a tus necesidades y expectativas. Aprende a personalizar tus interacciones configurando tus instrucciones personalizadas. Descubre también los puntos de precaución a considerar para un uso óptimo.

Los GPTs

Descubre el funcionamiento de los GPTs, esas mini aplicaciones hiperespecializadas que a veces pueden superar a ChatGPT. Aprende a crear tu propio GPT paso a paso. Domina las llamadas a la API para maximizar las capacidades de ChatGPT y descubre al final de esta sección cómo monetizar tus GPTs y, en general, cómo ganar dinero gracias a ChatGPT.

Gestión de API y Playground

Explora el playground de ChatGPT y descubre las nuevas funcionalidades que ofrece. Aprende a hacer llamadas a la API de ChatGPT con niveles de dificultad crecientes. Así, podrás utilizar ChatGPT fuera de la interfaz, crear un chatbot en otro sitio o incluso integrar ChatGPT en otros software como Google Sheets o Excel, por ejemplo.
targetAudiences: A cualquier persona que desee dominar la IA y ChatGPT. Esta formación es para todos los niveles.

courseDetails.title: Executive Certificate in Sales Management
courseDetails.shortDescription: Executive Certificate in Sales Management by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 450 000 students.


Course Author:

Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Overview of Sales Management Principles

Sales management involves planning, coordinating, directing, and controlling sales activities to achieve

organisational goals. It covers setting sales targets, designing strategies, managing teams, and evaluating performance.

Key principles include effective communication, strategic planning, relationship building, customer focus, and continuous improvement.


Importance of Data Analysis in Sales Management

Data analysis is crucial for strategic decision-making and improving sales performance.

It involves gathering, interpreting, and using data to identify trends and insights.

Data analysis helps track KPIs, evaluate strategies, and make data-driven decisions for better sales outcomes.


Sales management is the process of leading, motivating, and guiding a sales team to achieve an organization's sales objectives. It involves various activities, including:

  • Setting sales targets and goals: Defining clear and measurable objectives for the sales team to achieve.

  • Developing sales strategies: Creating plans and tactics to reach target customers and generate sales.

  • Recruiting and training sales personnel: Hiring and developing a skilled and motivated sales force.

  • Managing and coaching sales teams: Providing guidance, support, and feedback to improve sales performance.

  • Monitoring and analyzing sales data: Tracking key metrics and using data-driven insights to optimize sales efforts.

  • Building and maintaining customer relationships: Developing strong connections with customers to drive loyalty and repeat business.

Importance of learning sales management for companies:

  • Increased revenue and profitability: Effective sales management leads to higher sales and improved financial performance.

  • Competitive advantage: Well-trained sales teams can outperform competitors and gain market share.

  • Improved customer satisfaction: A focus on customer needs and relationship building enhances customer experience and satisfaction.

  • Enhanced operational efficiency: Optimized sales processes and strategies streamline operations and reduce costs.

  • Adaptability to changing markets: Sales management skills help companies respond to market trends and stay ahead of the curve.

Importance of learning sales management for building a career as a manager:

  • Leadership development: Sales management provides valuable experience in leading and motivating teams.

  • Strategic thinking: Managers learn to develop and implement sales strategies that drive business growth.

  • Problem-solving skills: They gain expertise in identifying and resolving challenges in the sales process.

  • Communication and interpersonal skills: Effective communication is essential for managing relationships with customers and team members.

  • Data analysis and decision-making: Sales managers learn to use data to make informed decisions and optimize sales performance.

  • Career advancement opportunities: A strong background in sales management opens doors to higher-level management positions.

In summary, sales management is a crucial function that drives business success. Learning sales management equips companies with the skills and knowledge to achieve their sales goals, while also providing individuals with the foundation for a successful career in management.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in management and business

courseDetails.title: Network Mastery for Ethical Hackers
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering Network Security: A Comprehensive Course for Ethical Hackers
courseDetails.longDescription:
Embark on a transformative journey into the realm of cybersecurity with our comprehensive course, 'Mastering Network Security for Ethical Hackers.' This meticulously crafted program is designed to equip you with a deep understanding of the fundamental principles and advanced techniques that underpin secure network environments.

The course begins with an insightful 'Introduction,' laying the groundwork for your exploration into the intricacies of network security. Delve into the 'Basics of Networking' and unravel the key components that form the backbone of modern communication systems. Understand the 'Goals of Network Security' as you navigate through the intricate landscape of safeguarding information.

Grasp the nuances of 'Network Protocols' and gain hands-on experience with 'Hardware Internet Devices.' Navigate the layers of the 'OSI model' and decipher the significance of the '3-way Handshake' in secure communications. Dive into the world of 'IP Addresses,' 'DHCP,' and 'DNS,' mastering the essential elements that define network configurations.

Explore advanced topics like 'Subnetting,' 'SNMP,' 'ARP,' 'Wi-Fi,' and 'Nmap,' honing your skills to proactively identify and mitigate potential security threats. This course provides a holistic approach, ensuring you not only comprehend theoretical concepts but also gain practical experience through real-world scenarios.

Whether you're an aspiring ethical hacker or a seasoned professional, this course caters to all levels of expertise. Elevate your skills, safeguard digital landscapes, and become a proficient ethical hacker with 'Mastering Network Security for Ethical Hackers.
targetAudiences: Cybersecurity Enthusiasts.
Security Analysts and Engineers.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT e IA: Corso completo sull'IA generativa
courseDetails.shortDescription: Padroneggia l'IA: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini - guida completa sull'intelligenza artificiale e le IA generative.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formazione Completa su ChatGPT e IA Generative:

Siete pronti a iniziare ogni giornata con un alleato, un assistente personale estremamente abile, capace di svolgere i vostri compiti con una precisione e una rapidità senza pari?

Un'IA capace di scrivere email, articoli o rapporti, di creare immagini ispiratrici, di analizzare dati complessi, di programmare soluzioni su misura e di risolvere una moltitudine di problemi, permettendovi così di concentrarvi su ciò che conta davvero.

Per ottenere tutti questi benefici dall'IA, è necessario padroneggiarla. Molte persone si entusiasmano, provano 2 o 3 prompt e finiscono per abbandonare il tema senza scoprire il vero potenziale dell'intelligenza artificiale. Questo comportamento spesso è dovuto a una mancanza di conoscenza delle tecniche, dei metodi e delle configurazioni che permettono di ottenere i migliori risultati con l'IA.

L'obiettivo di questa formazione è quindi di fornirvi tutte le chiavi per comunicare efficacemente con l'IA, configurarla al meglio e sfruttarla appieno.

Per raggiungere questo scopo, ho progettato un percorso conciso e dinamico che vi permetterà di sviluppare le conoscenze e le competenze essenziali per l'utilizzo ottimizzato dell'IA.


Durante questa formazione, vedremo insieme:

  • Come formulare richieste chiare all'IA per ottenere le migliori risposte possibili.

  • Come configurare ChatGPT affinché diventi il vostro professore, co-fondatore o analista di fiducia.

  • Come generare molteplici idee e migliorare nel vostro lavoro, diventando più produttivi, più veloci, più pertinenti ed efficienti.

  • Come sfruttare appieno la multimodalità di ChatGPT per scrivergli, parlargli, ascoltarlo, trasmettergli immagini e chiedergli di interpretarle.

  • Come spingere Dall-e o Copilot a generare le migliori immagini possibili.

  • Come trovare alternative interessanti alla versione a pagamento di ChatGPT.

  • Esploreremo anche altre IA come Copilot, Claude o Gemini.

  • Vedremo come adattare ChatGPT alle vostre preferenze e bisogni specifici per risposte su misura.

  • Vedremo come potenziare ChatGPT grazie ai GPT: come utilizzare queste applicazioni e persino come crearle senza essere sviluppatori.

  • Esploreremo anche argomenti più tecnici alla fine della formazione, come la gestione delle API, il playground, l'integrazione di ChatGPT su altri software come Excel o Google Sheets, per esempio.

  • E soprattutto vedremo che tutto questo è accessibile a tutti, anche ai principianti.


In questa formazione troverete:

  • Dimostrazioni concrete.

  • Schede tecniche e guide pratiche scaricabili.

[Aggiornamento: Ho aggiunto video sull'uso del modello GPT4o, successore della versione GPT4]

In breve, vi apprestate a seguire un corso chiaro, accessibile e coinvolgente. Abbastanza dettagliato da coprire i concetti essenziali senza essere troppo lungo. Indipendentemente dal vostro livello di partenza, che siate principianti o alla ricerca di tecniche avanzate, questa è l'unica formazione di cui avrete bisogno per padroneggiare ChatGPT.


La mia presentazione:

Mi chiamo Yassine Rochd, sono il fondatore di un ente di formazione che ha aiutato migliaia di studenti a raggiungere i loro obiettivi professionali.

Sono anche appassionato di tecnologia. Dopo una laurea magistrale in finanza e esperienze nella consulenza e nei fondi di investimento, ho seguito una formazione in sviluppo web e trascorso centinaia di ore a scoprire e utilizzare le IA.

Oggi desidero trasmettervi nel modo più chiaro possibile ciò che ho imparato in questi anni.


Certificazione e garanzia:

Completando questa formazione, riceverete una certificazione che potrete anche condividere su LinkedIn. Questa formazione è inoltre senza rischi, grazie alla garanzia "soddisfatti o rimborsati" di 30 giorni. Avrete accesso a vita alla formazione, alle risorse scaricabili e ai futuri aggiornamenti. Siete a un clic di distanza dal padroneggiare una tecnologia estremamente utile che vi renderà più efficienti, più produttivi e semplicemente indispensabili.


Dettaglio delle diverse sezioni di questo corso:

Introduzione rapida a ChatGPT
Scoprite come padroneggiare rapidamente ChatGPT con poche video lezioni. Esplorate l'interfaccia intuitiva di ChatGPT e imparate a creare i vostri primi prompt per sfruttare appieno la potenza dell'IA. Che si tratti di generare tabelle, fare brainstorming, creare idee, tradurre e correggere testi o redigere vari contenuti, diventerete più veloci e performanti con l'IA. Scoprite come ChatGPT può assistervi nella ricerca di lavoro e adattarsi alle vostre esigenze professionali per aumentare la vostra efficienza. Vedrete che ChatGPT è capace di creare una varietà di contenuti, dalle email e lettere agli articoli e post per i social media, senza dimenticare la scrittura di codice informatico.

Le basi del prompt engineering
Imparate perché il prompt engineering è essenziale e come può trasformare ChatGPT in un vero esperto. Capite l'importanza del contesto e degli obiettivi per strutturare le vostre interazioni e scoprite come regolare il formato e la temperatura per ottimizzare i vostri prompt e variare il livello di creatività del modello. Personalizzate le vostre interazioni padroneggiando il tono e lo stile, e beneficiate di cinque consigli pratici per ottenere risposte ancora più pertinenti da ChatGPT.

Tecniche avanzate di prompt engineering
In questa sezione, vedremo come creare prompt che generano altri prompt. Studieremo il metodo del reverse engineering, le funzionalità di ricerca web, l'interpretazione delle immagini e molte altre tecniche avanzate.

Dall-e
Passeremo alla generazione di immagini con Dall-e. Vedrete come passare da un risultato mediocre a opere estetiche e ispiratrici, come modificare semplicemente e rapidamente porzioni di immagini e ottimizzare i vostri risultati. Studieremo anche tecniche avanzate che vi permetteranno, per esempio, di creare una continuità nella generazione di un personaggio di finzione o di fumetti, per risultati ancora più impressionanti.

Le soluzioni ai limiti di ChatGPT e dell'IA
ChatGPT e altri modelli di intelligenza artificiale presentano dei limiti e delle debolezze. Vedremo in questa sezione quali sono e come superarle.

Funzionalità interessanti di ChatGPT
Imparate a configurare le funzionalità di condivisione delle vostre conversazioni per un utilizzo collaborativo di ChatGPT. Sfruttate al meglio l'applicazione mobile ChatGPT, esplorando tutte le opzioni che offre. Infine, scoprite i metodi per creare un contenuto unico con l'IA evitando qualsiasi forma di plagio o contenuto duplicato.

Copilot e Bing
Copilot propone diverse alternative interessanti a funzionalità avanzate e a pagamento di ChatGPT. Vedremo come sfruttare la collaborazione tra Microsoft e OpenAI per accedere a funzionalità avanzate di intelligenza artificiale integrate nel motore di ricerca Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral e altri
Nella continuità della sezione precedente, studieremo altre IA come Gemini di Google o Claude di Anthropic. Vedremo i loro punti di forza e di debolezza, e studieremo diversi casi d'uso per sapere quando preferirle a ChatGPT.

Istruzioni personalizzate di ChatGPT
Adattate ChatGPT alle vostre esigenze e aspettative. Imparate a personalizzare le vostre interazioni configurando le vostre istruzioni personalizzate. Scoprite anche i punti di attenzione da considerare per un utilizzo ottimale.

I GPT
Scoprite il funzionamento dei GPT, queste mini applicazioni iperspecializzate che a volte possono superare ChatGPT. Imparate a creare il vostro GPT passo dopo passo. Padroneggiate le chiamate API per massimizzare le capacità di ChatGPT e scoprite alla fine della sezione come monetizzare i vostri GPT e, più in generale, come guadagnare denaro grazie a ChatGPT.

Gestione delle API e Playground
Esplorate il playground di ChatGPT e scoprite le nuove funzionalità che offre. Imparate a chiamare l'API di ChatGPT con livelli di difficoltà crescenti. Potrete così utilizzare ChatGPT al di fuori dell'interfaccia, creare un chatbot su un altro sito o anche integrare ChatGPT in altri software come Google Sheets o Excel, per esempio.
targetAudiences: Chiunque desideri padroneggiare l'IA e ChatGPT. Questa formazione è per tutti i livelli.

courseDetails.title: Introduction to Business and Data Analysis
courseDetails.shortDescription: Introduction to Business and Data Analysis Course by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Introduction to Business and Data Analysis

Important! Course focused to business needs and business meaning of analysis, not to usage of analytical software.
Its guideline to what questions you need to focus your efforts during analysis.


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 450 000 students.


Course Author:

Dr. Pedro Nunes has built a multifaceted career combining academia and practical business expertise. His educational journey culminated with a Doctorate in Economic Analysis and Business Strategy with a cum laude mention from the University of Santiago de Compostela. Professionally, he has navigated through various sectors, including technology, international commerce, and consultancy, with roles ranging from business analyst to director. Currently, Pedro serves as a Professor in several DBA programs, applying his extensive industry experience and academic insights to educate the next generation of professionals.


Business and Data Analysis (BDA) is the practice of using data to understand, improve, and optimize business processes. It involves collecting, cleaning, analyzing, and interpreting data to uncover insights that can inform decision-making and drive strategic initiatives.


Importance of Business and Data Analysis for Business

BDA is essential for modern businesses due to several key reasons:

  1. Data-Driven Decision Making: BDA allows businesses to make informed decisions based on factual evidence rather than intuition or guesswork. This leads to more effective strategies and better outcomes.

  2. Improved Efficiency: By identifying bottlenecks and inefficiencies in processes, BDA can help businesses streamline operations and reduce costs.

  3. Enhanced Customer Experience: Analyzing customer data can reveal preferences and pain points, enabling businesses to tailor products, services, and marketing campaigns to meet customer needs more effectively.

  4. Competitive Advantage: Companies that leverage BDA can gain valuable insights into market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activities, giving them an edge in the marketplace.

  5. Risk Management: BDA can help businesses identify and mitigate potential risks by analyzing historical data and forecasting future trends.


Main Focuses of Analysis of Business Data

The main focuses of BDA can vary depending on the specific goals of the business. However, some common areas of analysis include:

  • Sales and Revenue: Analyzing sales data to identify trends, understand customer buying behavior, and optimize pricing strategies.

  • Marketing and Customer Acquisition: Evaluating the effectiveness of marketing campaigns, identifying high-value customer segments, and improving customer acquisition and retention.

  • Operational Efficiency: Examining processes and workflows to identify areas for improvement, reduce costs, and enhance productivity.

  • Financial Performance: Analyzing financial data to track profitability, identify cost-saving opportunities, and make informed investment decisions.

  • Risk Assessment: Evaluating internal and external factors that could pose a risk to the business and developing strategies to mitigate those risks.


How Building Skills in Business and Data Analysis Can Support Career Development

Developing skills in BDA can significantly enhance career prospects in several ways:

  1. High Demand: Professionals with BDA expertise are in high demand across various industries, opening up a wide range of career opportunities.

  2. Career Advancement: BDA skills can lead to promotions and increased responsibilities within an organization.

  3. Versatility: BDA skills are transferable across different industries and functions, providing flexibility and adaptability in the job market.

  4. Entrepreneurial Opportunities: Individuals with BDA skills can leverage their knowledge to start their own businesses or consulting practices.

  5. Problem-Solving Skills: BDA develops critical thinking and problem-solving skills, which are valuable assets in any career.

Business and Data Analysis is a critical tool for businesses to thrive in the data-driven world. By harnessing the power of data, organizations can make informed decisions, improve efficiency, enhance customer experiences, and gain a competitive edge. Building skills in BDA can open up exciting career opportunities and provide a solid foundation for professional growth.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in management and business
