courseDetails.title: ChatGPT i Sztuczna Inteligencja: Kompleksowe szkolenie z AI
courseDetails.shortDescription: Zdobądź mistrzostwo w sztucznej inteligencji: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude AI- kompletny przewodnik po sztucznej inteligencji
courseDetails.longDescription:
Kompleksowe szkolenie z ChatGPT i AI:

Czy jesteś gotowy, aby każdy dzień rozpoczynać z osobistym asystentem, który realizuje Twoje zadania z niezrównaną precyzją i szybkością? Sztuczna inteligencja, która potrafi pisać Twoje maile, artykuły czy raporty, tworzyć inspirujące obrazy, analizować skomplikowane dane, dostarczać niestandardowe rozwiązania i rozwiązywać liczne problemy, umożliwiając Ci skupienie się na tym, co naprawdę ważne.

Aby w pełni wykorzystać te korzyści, musisz opanować AI. Wiele osób ekscytuje się, realizuje 2-3 prompty i na tym kończy, nie odkrywając prawdziwego potencjału sztucznej inteligencji. Często wynika to z braku znajomości technik, metod i ustawień, które pozwalają uzyskać najlepsze wyniki z AI.

Celem tego szkolenia jest przekazanie Ci wszystkich kluczy do efektywnej komunikacji z AI, jej optymalnej konfiguracji i pełnego wykorzystania jej możliwości.

Aby to osiągnąć, opracowałem zwięzły i dynamiczny program, który pozwoli Ci zdobyć niezbędną wiedzę i umiejętności do optymalnego wykorzystania AI.

W trakcie tego szkolenia wspólnie omówimy:

  • Jak formułować jasne zapytania do AI, aby uzyskać najlepsze możliwe odpowiedzi.

  • Jak skonfigurować ChatGPT, aby stał się Twoim nauczycielem, współzałożycielem lub zaufanym analitykiem.

  • Jak generować wiele pomysłów i stawać się lepszym w swojej pracy, bardziej produktywnym, szybszym, bardziej trafnym i efektywnym.

  • Jak w pełni wykorzystać multimodalność ChatGPT, aby pisać do niego, mówić, słuchać, przekazywać obrazy i prosić o ich interpretację.

  • Jak zmusić Dall-e lub Copilot do generowania najlepszych możliwych obrazów.

  • Jak znaleźć interesujące alternatywy dla płatnej wersji ChatGPT.

  • Zbadamy także inne AI, takie jak Copilot, Claude czy Gemini.

  • Dowiemy się, jak dostosować ChatGPT do Twoich preferencji i specyficznych potrzeb, aby uzyskać niestandardowe odpowiedzi.

  • Zobaczymy, jak wzmocnić ChatGPT dzięki GPT: jak używać tych aplikacji i nawet jak je tworzyć bez bycia programistą.

  • Przyjrzymy się również bardziej technicznym zagadnieniom na końcu szkolenia, takim jak zarządzanie API, playground, integracja ChatGPT z innymi programami jak Excel czy Google Sheets.

I przede wszystkim, zobaczymy, że to wszystko jest dostępne dla każdego, nawet dla początkujących.

W tym szkoleniu znajdziesz:

  • Konkretne demonstracje.

  • Arkusze techniczne i praktyczne przewodniki do pobrania.


[Aktualizacja: Dodałem filmy dotyczące użycia modelu GPT-4o, który jest następcą wersji GPT-4]

W skrócie, przystępujesz do jasnego, dostępnego i angażującego kursu. Jest on wystarczająco szczegółowy, aby pokryć kluczowe pojęcia, bez zbędnego przeciągania. Niezależnie od Twojego poziomu zaawansowania, czy jesteś początkujący, czy szukasz zaawansowanych technik, to jedyne szkolenie, jakiego potrzebujesz, aby opanować ChatGPT.


Moja prezentacja:

Nazywam się Yassine Rochd, jestem założycielem organizacji szkoleniowej, która pomogła tysiącom osób osiągnąć ich cele zawodowe.

Jestem także pasjonatem technologii. Po ukończeniu studiów magisterskich z finansów i doświadczeniu w konsultingu oraz funduszach inwestycyjnych, odbyłem szkolenie z zakresu web developmentu i spędziłem setki godzin na odkrywaniu i używaniu AI.

Dziś chcę przekazać Ci w jak najjaśniejszy sposób to, czego nauczyłem się przez ostatnie lata.


Certyfikacja i gwarancja:

Po ukończeniu tego szkolenia otrzymasz certyfikat, który będziesz mógł udostępnić na LinkedIn.

Szkolenie jest również bez ryzyka, ponieważ obejmuje 30-dniową gwarancję satysfakcji lub zwrotu pieniędzy.

Masz dożywotni dostęp do szkolenia, zasobów do pobrania oraz przyszłych aktualizacji.

Jesteś o krok od opanowania niezwykle przydatnej technologii, która uczyni Cię bardziej efektywnym, produktywnym i po prostu niezastąpionym.


Szczegółowy opis poszczególnych sekcji tego kursu:

Szybki start z ChatGPT

Dowiedz się, jak szybko opanować ChatGPT w zaledwie kilku filmach. Zanurz się w intuicyjny interfejs ChatGPT i naucz się tworzyć pierwsze prompty, aby w pełni wykorzystać moc AI. Niezależnie od tego, czy chcesz generować tabele, brainstormować, generować pomysły, tłumaczyć i poprawiać teksty, czy też pisać różnorodne treści, z AI będziesz działać szybciej i wydajniej. Zobacz, jak ChatGPT może pomóc w poszukiwaniu pracy i dostosować się do Twoich potrzeb zawodowych, aby zwiększyć efektywność. Zobaczysz, że ChatGPT jest w stanie tworzyć mnóstwo treści, od maili i listów po artykuły i posty na mediach społecznościowych, nie zapominając o pisaniu kodu komputerowego.

Podstawy prompt engineering

Dowiedz się, dlaczego prompt engineering jest kluczowy i jak może przekształcić ChatGPT w prawdziwego eksperta. Zrozum, jak ważny jest kontekst i cele w strukturze interakcji, oraz jak dostosować format i temperaturę, aby zoptymalizować prompty i zmieniać poziom kreatywności modelu. Personalizuj swoje interakcje, opanowując ton i styl, i skorzystaj z 5 praktycznych wskazówek, aby uzyskać jeszcze bardziej trafne odpowiedzi od ChatGPT.

Zaawansowane techniki prompt engineering

W tej sekcji zobaczymy, jak tworzyć prompty, które same generują inne prompty. Przestudiujemy metodę reverse engineering, funkcje wyszukiwania w sieci, interpretacji obrazów i wiele innych zaawansowanych technik.

Dall-e

Przejdziemy do generowania obrazów za pomocą Dall-e. Zobaczysz, jak przejść od przeciętnego wyniku do estetycznych i inspirujących dzieł, jak prosto i szybko modyfikować fragmenty obrazów i optymalizować wyniki. Zbadamy również zaawansowane techniki, które pozwolą na przykład na tworzenie ciągłości w generowaniu postaci fikcyjnych lub komiksowych, dla jeszcze bardziej imponujących rezultatów.

Rozwiązania dla ograniczeń ChatGPT i AI

ChatGPT i inne modele sztucznej inteligencji mają swoje ograniczenia i słabości. W tej sekcji omówimy, jakie są te ograniczenia i jak je przezwyciężyć.

Ciekawe funkcje ChatGPT

Naucz się konfigurować funkcje udostępniania swoich rozmów dla wspólnej pracy z ChatGPT. Wykorzystaj w pełni aplikację mobilną Chat GPT, eksplorując wszystkie oferowane opcje. Odkryj metody tworzenia unikalnych treści za pomocą AI, unikając plagiatu i duplikacji treści.

Copilot i Bing

Copilot oferuje kilka interesujących alternatyw dla płatnych i zaawansowanych funkcji ChatGPT. Zobaczymy, jak skorzystać z partnerstwa Microsoftu i OpenAI, aby uzyskać dostęp do zaawansowanych funkcji sztucznej inteligencji zintegrowanych z wyszukiwarką Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral i inne

W kontynuacji poprzedniej sekcji zbadamy inne AI, takie jak Gemini od Google czy Claude od Anthropic. Zobaczymy ich mocne i słabe strony oraz zbadamy różne przypadki użycia, aby wiedzieć, kiedy lepiej wybrać je zamiast ChatGPT.

Custom Instructions ChatGPT

Dostosuj ChatGPT do swoich potrzeb i oczekiwań. Naucz się personalizować swoje interakcje, konfigurując swoje custom instructions. Odkryj również, na co zwracać uwagę, aby optymalnie korzystać z AI.

GPTs

Poznaj działanie GPTs, tych mini aplikacji wyspecjalizowanych, które czasem mogą przewyższać ChatGPT. Naucz się krok po kroku tworzyć własne GPT. Opanuj wywołania API, aby maksymalizować możliwości ChatGPT, a na końcu sekcji dowiedz się, jak monetyzować swoje GPTs i szerzej, jak zarabiać dzięki ChatGPT.

Zarządzanie API i Playground

Zbadaj playground ChatGPT i odkryj nowe funkcje, które oferuje. Naucz się wywoływać API ChatGPT o różnym poziomie trudności. Będziesz mógł używać ChatGPT poza interfejsem, tworzyć chatboty na innych stronach lub nawet integrować ChatGPT z innymi programami, takimi jak Google Sheets czy Excel.
targetAudiences: Kurs jest przeznaczony dla każdego, kto chce opanować AI i ChatGPT. Jest odpowiedni dla wszystkich poziomów zaawansowania.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT ve Yapay Zeka: kapsamlı yapay zeka eğitimi
courseDetails.shortDescription: Yapay Zekayı Öğrenin: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini - yapay zeka hakkında kapsamlı rehber
courseDetails.longDescription:
ChatGPT ve Yapay Zeka Eğitimi:

Her güne, görevlerinizi benzersiz bir hız ve hassasiyetle yerine getirebilecek son derece yetenekli bir kişisel asistanla başlamak ister misiniz? E-postalarınızı, makalelerinizi veya raporlarınızı yazabilen, ilham verici görseller üretebilen, karmaşık verileri analiz edebilen, özel çözümler kodlayabilen ve çeşitli sorunları çözebilen bir yapay zeka ile çalışarak, gerçekten önemli olan konulara odaklanabilirsiniz.

Ancak, bu avantajlardan tam anlamıyla yararlanabilmek için yapay zekayı derinlemesine anlamak önemlidir. Pek çok kişi birkaç komut verip, yapay zekanın gerçek potansiyelini keşfetmeden süreci yarıda bırakıyor. Bunun arkasında genellikle, yapay zekadan en iyi sonuçları almanızı sağlayacak teknikler, yöntemler ve ince ayarlar hakkında bilgi eksikliği bulunur.

Bu eğitimin amacı, yapay zeka ile etkili bir şekilde iletişim kurabilmeniz, onu en iyi şekilde yapılandırmanız ve tam potansiyelinden faydalanmanız için size gerekli tüm araçları sunmaktır.

Bu hedefe ulaşmak için, yapay zekayı optimize ederek kullanmanız gereken temel bilgi ve becerileri kazanmanızı sağlayacak kapsamlı ve dinamik bir eğitim hazırladım.

Bu eğitim süresince birlikte şunları öğreneceğiz:

  • En iyi sonuçları almak için yapay zekaya nasıl net sorular sorulur.

  • ChatGPT'yi güvenilir öğretmeniniz, iş ortağınız veya analiz uzmanınız haline getirecek şekilde nasıl yapılandırılır.

  • Çalışmalarınızda daha üretken, hızlı, anlamlı ve etkili olmak için nasıl çeşitli fikirler üretebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'nin çok yönlü kullanımından tam olarak faydalanmak için ona nasıl yazılır, nasıl konuşulur, nasıl dinlenir, ona görseller nasıl gönderilir ve nasıl yorumlanması istenir.

  • Dall-e veya Copilot'u en iyi görselleri üretmeleri için nasıl yönlendirebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'nin ücretli sürümüne alternatif olarak hangi ilginç seçenekleri değerlendirebilirsiniz.

  • Copilot, Claude veya Gemini gibi diğer yapay zeka araçlarını da keşfedeceğiz.

  • ChatGPT'yi özel ihtiyaçlarınıza ve tercihinize göre nasıl özelleştirebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'yi GPT’lerle nasıl güçlendirebileceğimizi göreceğiz: Bu uygulamaları nasıl kullanacağınızı ve hatta geliştirici olmadan nasıl oluşturabileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.

  • Eğitimin sonunda, API yönetimi, Playground, ChatGPT’nin Excel veya Google Sheets gibi yazılımlara entegrasyonu gibi daha teknik konuları da ele alacağız.

  • Ve en önemlisi, tüm bunların başlangıç seviyesindeki kişiler için bile erişilebilir olduğunu göreceğiz.

Bu eğitimde şunları bulacaksınız:

  • Pratik ve somut gösterimler.

  • İndirilebilir teknik bilgiler ve pratik kılavuzlar.

[Güncelleme: GPT-4'ün yerini alan GPT-4o modelinin kullanımına dair videolar ekledim]

Kısacası, açık, erişilebilir ve ilgi çekici bir kursa başlamak üzeresiniz. Gerekli kavramları detaylı bir şekilde ele alan, ancak gereksiz uzunluğa kaçmayan bu eğitim, ChatGPT'yi tam anlamıyla öğrenmeniz için ihtiyacınız olan tek kaynak olacak. Başlangıç seviyeniz ne olursa olsun, ister yeni başlıyor olun ister ileri düzey teknikler arıyor olun, bu kurs size hitap edecek.


Tanıtımım:

Adım Yassine Rochd, binlerce öğrencinin profesyonel hedeflerine ulaşmasına yardımcı olan bir eğitim kuruluşunun kurucusuyum.

Teknolojiye büyük bir tutku duyuyorum. Finans alanında yüksek lisans yaptıktan ve danışmanlık ile yatırım fonları alanında deneyim kazandıktan sonra, web geliştirme konusunda eğitim aldım ve yüzlerce saatimi yapay zekayı keşfetmeye ve kullanmaya adadım.

Bugün, son birkaç yılda öğrendiklerimi size en anlaşılır şekilde aktarmayı hedefliyorum.


Sertifikasyon ve Garanti:

  • Bu eğitimi tamamladığınızda, LinkedIn'de bile paylaşabileceğiniz bir sertifika alacaksınız.

  • Eğitimimiz risksizdir; çünkü 30 günlük "memnuniyet garantisi" sunuyoruz.

  • Ayrıca, eğitime ve indirilebilir kaynaklara ömür boyu erişim hakkınız olacak.

Sizi daha etkili, daha üretken ve vazgeçilmez kılacak bu son derece faydalı teknolojiyi öğrenmek için sadece bir tık uzaktasınız.


Kursun Bölüm Detayları:

ChatGPT'ye Hızlı Başlangıç:

ChatGPT'yi yalnızca birkaç video ile hızla öğrenin. ChatGPT'nin sezgisel arayüzüne adım atın ve yapay zekanın gücünü tam anlamıyla kullanabilmek için ilk komutlarınızı nasıl oluşturacağınızı öğrenin. Tablo oluşturmadan beyin fırtınasına, fikir üretmeden metin çevirisi ve düzeltmeye kadar çeşitli içerikler oluşturmak için ChatGPT ile daha hızlı ve verimli olacaksınız. ChatGPT'nin iş arayışınızda size nasıl yardımcı olabileceğini ve profesyonel ihtiyaçlarınıza uyum sağlayarak verimliliğinizi nasıl artırabileceğini keşfedin. ChatGPT'nin e-postalar ve mektuplardan makalelere ve sosyal medya paylaşımlarına, hatta yazılım kodlamasına kadar birçok içerik oluşturma yeteneğine sahip olduğunu göreceksiniz.


Prompt Engineering'in Temelleri

Prompt engineering'in önemini ve ChatGPT'yi gerçek bir uzmana dönüştürme yöntemlerini keşfedin. Etkileşimlerinizi yapılandırmak için bağlamın ve hedeflerin rolünü anlayın; en iyi sonuçları elde etmek için format ve sıcaklık ayarlarını nasıl optimize edeceğinizi öğrenin. Ton ve stil kontrolü ile etkileşimlerinizi kişiselleştirin ve ChatGPT'den daha alakalı yanıtlar alabilmeniz için 5 pratik ipucunu uygulayın.


İleri Düzey Prompt Engineering Teknikleri

Bu bölümde, kendi kendine yeni promptlar üretebilen promptlar oluşturmayı öğreneceğiz. Reverse engineering (tersine mühendislik), web arama işlevleri, görüntü yorumlama teknikleri ve diğer birçok ileri düzey tekniği derinlemesine inceleyeceğiz.


Dall-e

Dall-e ile görsel oluşturma sürecine adım atacağız. Orta düzeydeki bir sonuçtan estetik ve ilham verici eserlere nasıl geçiş yapabileceğinizi, görüntülerin belirli bölümlerini basit ve hızlı bir şekilde nasıl değiştirebileceğinizi ve sonuçlarınızı nasıl optimize edebileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz. Ayrıca, bir çizgi roman ya da kurgusal karakterin sürekliliğini yaratmanıza olanak tanıyan ileri düzey teknikleri inceleyerek daha etkileyici sonuçlar elde edebileceksiniz.


ChatGPT ve Yapay Zekanın Sınırlarına Çözümler

ChatGPT ve diğer yapay zeka modellerinin belirli sınırlamaları ve zayıflıkları vardır. Bu bölümde, bu sınırlamaların neler olduğunu ve bunları nasıl aşabileceğinizi inceleyeceğiz.


ChatGPT'deki İlginç Özellikler

ChatGPT'yi işbirlikçi bir şekilde kullanabilmek için sohbetlerinizi paylaşma özelliklerini nasıl yapılandıracağınızı öğrenin. ChatGPT mobil uygulamasını en iyi şekilde kullanmak için sunduğu tüm seçenekleri keşfedin. Son olarak, yapay zeka ile benzersiz içerikler oluşturmanın ve her türlü intihal veya kopya içerikten kaçınmanın yollarını öğreneceksiniz.


Copilot ve Bing

Copilot, ChatGPT'nin ücretli ve gelişmiş özelliklerine birkaç ilginç alternatif sunar. Microsoft ve OpenAI iş birliği sayesinde, Bing arama motoruna entegre edilmiş ileri düzey yapay zeka özelliklerine nasıl erişebileceğinizi inceleyeceğiz.


Gemini, Claude, Mistral ve Diğerleri

Bir önceki bölümün devamı olarak, Google'ın Gemini'si veya Anthropic'in Claude'u gibi diğer yapay zeka modellerini inceleyeceğiz. Bu modellerin güçlü ve zayıf yönlerini değerlendirerek, hangi durumlarda ChatGPT yerine tercih edilebileceklerini göreceğiz.


ChatGPT Özel Talimatları (Custom Instructions)

ChatGPT'yi ihtiyaçlarınıza ve beklentilerinize göre nasıl özelleştireceğinizi öğrenin. Özel talimatlarınızı yapılandırarak etkileşimlerinizi nasıl kişiselleştirebileceğinizi keşfedin ve optimum kullanım için göz önünde bulundurmanız gereken önemli noktaları öğrenin.


GPT'ler

Bazı durumlarda ChatGPT'yi bile geride bırakabilen, son derece uzmanlaşmış mini uygulamalar olan GPT'lerin nasıl çalıştığını keşfedin. Kendi GPT'nizi adım adım nasıl oluşturacağınızı öğrenin. ChatGPT'nin yeteneklerini en üst düzeye çıkarmak için API çağrılarını nasıl yöneteceğinizi öğrenecek ve bölümün sonunda GPT'lerinizi nasıl paraya çevirebileceğinizi ve genel olarak ChatGPT ile nasıl gelir elde edebileceğinizi keşfedeceksiniz.


API Yönetimi ve Playground

ChatGPT'nin Playground'unu keşfedin ve sunduğu yeni özellikleri öğrenin. Artan zorluk seviyelerinde ChatGPT API'sine nasıl çağrı yapacağınızı öğrenin. Böylece ChatGPT'yi arayüz dışında kullanabilir, başka bir siteye chatbot yerleştirebilir veya ChatGPT'yi Google Sheets veya Excel gibi diğer yazılımlara entegre edebilirsiniz.
targetAudiences: Yapay zeka ve ChatGPT'yi öğrenmek isteyen herkes için, seviyeniz ne olursa olsun.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & IA: Formação Completa em Inteligência Artificial
courseDetails.shortDescription: Domine o ChatGPT, IA e a Engenharia de Prompt: Chat GPT, Dall-e, Copilot | O curso essencial de inteligência artificial
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formação Completa ChatGPT & IAs Generativas

Você está pronto para começar cada dia com um aliado, um assistente pessoal extremamente talentoso, pronto para realizar suas tarefas com precisão e rapidez incomparáveis?

Uma IA capaz de redigir seus e-mails, artigos ou relatórios, criar imagens inspiradoras, analisar dados complexos, programar soluções sob medida e resolver uma infinidade de problemas, permitindo que você se concentre no que realmente importa.

Para aproveitar todos esses benefícios da IA, é essencial dominá-la. Muitas pessoas se empolgam, fazem 2 ou 3 prompts e acabam abandonando o assunto sem descobrir o verdadeiro potencial da inteligência artificial. Esse comportamento muitas vezes revela um desconhecimento das técnicas, métodos e configurações que permitem obter os melhores resultados com a IA.

O objetivo desta formação é fornecer todas as chaves para comunicar eficazmente com a IA, configurá-la da melhor forma e aproveitá-la ao máximo.

Para alcançar isso, concebi um percurso conciso e dinâmico que permitirá a você desenvolver os conhecimentos e competências essenciais para a utilização otimizada da IA.

Durante esta formação, veremos juntos:

  • Como formular requisições claras para a IA para obter as melhores respostas possíveis.

  • Como configurar o ChatGPT para que ele se torne seu professor, co-fundador ou analista de confiança.

  • Como gerar múltiplas ideias e se tornar melhor no seu trabalho, mais produtivo, rápido, relevante e eficiente.

  • Como aproveitar ao máximo a multimodalidade do ChatGPT para escrever, falar, ouvir, transmitir imagens e pedir que ele as interprete.

  • Como fazer o Dall-e ou o Copilot gerar as melhores imagens possíveis.

  • Como encontrar alternativas interessantes para a versão paga do ChatGPT.

  • Exploraremos outras IAs como Copilot, Claude e Gemini.

  • Veremos como adaptar o ChatGPT às suas preferências e necessidades específicas para respostas personalizadas.

  • Vamos descobrir como potencializar o ChatGPT com os GPTs: como usar essas aplicações e até mesmo como criá-las sem ser um desenvolvedor.

  • Exploraremos tópicos mais técnicos no final da formação, como gerenciamento de API, playground, integração do ChatGPT com outros softwares como Excel ou Google Sheets, por exemplo.

  • E, sobretudo, veremos que tudo isso é acessível a todos, mesmo aos iniciantes.

Nesta formação, você encontrará:

  • Demonstrações concretas.

  • Fichas técnicas e guias práticos para download.

[Atualização: Adicionei vídeos sobre o uso do modelo GPT-4o, que sucede a versão GPT-4]

Em resumo, você está prestes a seguir um curso claro, acessível e envolvente. Detalhado o suficiente para cobrir os conceitos essenciais sem se prolongar demais. Não importa o seu nível de partida, seja você iniciante ou esteja em busca de técnicas avançadas, esta é a única formação que você precisará para dominar o ChatGPT.

Minha apresentação:

Meu nome é Yassine Rochd, sou fundador de uma organização de treinamento que ajudou milhares de aprendizes a alcançar seus objetivos profissionais. Sou também apaixonado por tecnologia. Após um mestrado em finanças e experiências em consultoria e fundos de investimento, fiz uma formação em desenvolvimento web e passei centenas de horas descobrindo e utilizando IAs. Hoje, desejo transmitir de forma clara o que aprendi nos últimos anos.

Certificação e Garantia:

  • Ao concluir esta formação, você receberá uma certificação que poderá compartilhar até mesmo no LinkedIn.

  • Esta formação é também sem riscos, pois você tem uma garantia de "satisfação ou reembolso" de 30 dias.

  • Você terá acesso vitalício à formação e aos recursos para download.

Você está a um clique de dominar uma tecnologia extremamente útil que tornará você mais eficiente, mais produtivo e simplesmente indispensável.


Detalhamento das Diferentes Seções deste Curso

Introdução Rápida ao ChatGPT

Descubra como dominar rapidamente o ChatGPT em apenas alguns vídeos. Mergulhe na interface intuitiva do ChatGPT e aprenda a criar seus primeiros prompts para aproveitar ao máximo o poder da IA. Seja para gerar tabelas, fazer brainstorming, gerar ideias, traduzir e corrigir textos, ou até redigir diversos conteúdos, você será mais rápido e eficiente com a IA. Descubra como o ChatGPT pode ajudá-lo na sua busca de emprego e se adaptar às suas necessidades profissionais para aumentar sua eficiência. Você verá que o ChatGPT é capaz de criar uma variedade de conteúdos, desde e-mails e cartas até artigos e postagens para redes sociais, sem esquecer a redação de códigos de programação.

Fundamentos do Prompt Engineering

Aprenda por que o prompt engineering é essencial e como ele pode transformar o ChatGPT em um verdadeiro especialista. Compreenda a importância do contexto e dos objetivos para estruturar suas interações, e descubra como ajustar o formato e a temperatura para otimizar seus prompts e variar o nível de criatividade do modelo. Personalize suas interações dominando o tom e o estilo, e aproveite 5 dicas práticas para obter respostas ainda mais pertinentes do ChatGPT.

Técnicas Avançadas de Prompt Engineering

Nesta seção, veremos como criar prompts que geram outros prompts. Estudaremos o método de reverse engineering, funcionalidades de busca na web, interpretação de imagens e muitas outras técnicas avançadas.

Dall-e

Em seguida, abordaremos a geração de imagens com Dall-e. Você verá como passar de um resultado mediano a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, como modificar de forma simples e rápida partes de imagens e otimizar seus resultados. Também estudaremos técnicas avançadas que permitirão, por exemplo, criar uma continuidade na geração de um personagem de ficção ou quadrinhos, para resultados ainda mais impressionantes.

Soluções para as Limitações do ChatGPT e da IA

ChatGPT e outros modelos de inteligência artificial apresentam limitações e fraquezas. Nesta seção, veremos quais são essas limitações e como superá-las.

Funcionalidades Interessantes do ChatGPT

Aprenda a configurar as funcionalidades de compartilhamento de suas conversas para uma utilização colaborativa do ChatGPT. Aproveite ao máximo o aplicativo móvel do ChatGPT, explorando todas as opções que ele oferece. Por fim, descubra métodos para criar conteúdo único com a IA, evitando qualquer forma de plágio ou conteúdo duplicado.

Copilot e Bing

O Copilot oferece várias alternativas interessantes para funcionalidades pagas e avançadas do ChatGPT. Veremos como aproveitar a parceria entre a Microsoft e a OpenAI para acessar funcionalidades avançadas de inteligência artificial integradas ao motor de busca Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral e Outros

Dando continuidade à seção anterior, estudaremos outras IAs, como o Gemini do Google e o Claude da Anthropic. Veremos suas forças, fraquezas e analisaremos vários casos de uso para saber em quais situações preferi-las ao ChatGPT.

Custom Instructions no ChatGPT

Adapte o ChatGPT às suas necessidades e expectativas. Aprenda a personalizar suas interações configurando suas custom instructions. Descubra também os pontos de atenção para uma utilização ótima.

Os GPTs

Descubra como funcionam os GPTs, essas miniaplicações hiperespecializadas que podem, às vezes, superar o ChatGPT. Aprenda a criar seu próprio GPT passo a passo. Domine as chamadas de API para maximizar as capacidades do ChatGPT e, ao final da seção, descubra como monetizar seus GPTs e, mais amplamente, como ganhar dinheiro com o ChatGPT.

Gestão de API & Playground

Explore o playground do ChatGPT e descubra as novas funcionalidades que ele oferece. Aprenda a chamar a API do ChatGPT com níveis crescentes de dificuldade. Assim, você poderá usar o ChatGPT fora da interface, criar um chatbot em outro site ou até mesmo integrar o ChatGPT a outros softwares, como Google Sheets ou Excel, por exemplo.
targetAudiences: Qualquer pessoa que deseje dominar a IA e o ChatGPT. Esta formação é adequada para todos os níveis.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & KI: Die ultimative künstliche intelligenz-schulung
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master KI und Prompt-Engineering: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Copilot, Gemini – Der umfassende Leitfaden zur generativen KI
courseDetails.longDescription:
Sind Sie bereit, jeden Tag mit einem außergewöhnlich talentierten persönlichen Assistenten zu beginnen, der Ihre Aufgaben mit unübertroffener Präzision und Geschwindigkeit erledigt? Eine KI, die Ihre E-Mails, Artikel oder Berichte verfasst, inspirierende Bilder erstellt, komplexe Daten analysiert, maßgeschneiderte Lösungen programmiert und eine Vielzahl von Problemen löst, sodass Sie sich auf das Wesentliche konzentrieren können.

Um all diese Vorteile der KI voll auszuschöpfen, müssen Sie jedoch lernen, sie richtig zu beherrschen. Viele Menschen sind anfangs begeistert, erstellen ein paar Eingabeaufforderungen und verlieren dann das Interesse, ohne das wahre Potenzial der künstlichen Intelligenz zu entdecken. Oft liegt dies an fehlenden Kenntnissen über die Techniken, Methoden und Einstellungen, die erforderlich sind, um optimale Ergebnisse mit der KI zu erzielen.

Ziel dieser Schulung ist es, Ihnen die Werkzeuge an die Hand zu geben, um effektiv mit der KI zu kommunizieren, sie optimal zu konfigurieren und ihr volles Potenzial auszuschöpfen.

Dazu habe ich einen prägnanten und dynamischen Kurs entwickelt, der Ihnen hilft, die wesentlichen Kenntnisse und Fähigkeiten für die optimale Nutzung der KI zu erwerben.

Im Verlauf dieser Schulung werden wir gemeinsam behandeln:

  • Wie Sie klare Anfragen an die KI formulieren, um die bestmöglichen Antworten zu erhalten.

  • Wie Sie ChatGPT so konfigurieren, dass es zu Ihrem Lehrer, Mitgründer oder vertrauenswürdigen Analysten wird.

  • Wie Sie mehrere Ideen generieren und Ihre Arbeit produktiver, schneller, relevanter und effizienter gestalten.

  • Wie Sie die Multimodalität von ChatGPT voll ausschöpfen, indem Sie ihm schreiben, mit ihm sprechen, ihm zuhören, ihm Bilder übermitteln und ihn bitten, diese zu interpretieren.

  • Wie Sie Dall-e oder Copilot dazu bringen, die besten Bilder zu erzeugen.

  • Wie Sie interessante Alternativen zur kostenpflichtigen Version von ChatGPT finden.

  • Wir werden auch andere KIs wie Copilot, Claude oder Gemini erkunden.

  • Wie Sie ChatGPT an Ihre spezifischen Vorlieben und Bedürfnisse anpassen können, um maßgeschneiderte Antworten zu erhalten.

  • Wie Sie ChatGPT mit GPTs erweitern können: wie man diese Anwendungen nutzt und sogar erstellt, ohne Entwickler zu sein.

  • Gegen Ende der Schulung werden wir einige technischere Themen behandeln, wie die Verwaltung von APIs, den Playground und die Integration von ChatGPT in andere Software wie Excel oder Google Sheets.

Und vor allem werden wir sehen, dass all dies für jedermann zugänglich ist, selbst für Anfänger.

In dieser Schulung finden Sie:

  • Konkrete Demonstrationen.

  • Technische Datenblätter und herunterladbare praktische Anleitungen.

[Aktualisierung: Ich habe Videos zur Nutzung des Modells GPT-4o hinzugefügt, das die Nachfolge von GPT-4 antritt.]

Kurz gesagt: Sie stehen kurz davor, an einem klar strukturierten, zugänglichen und ansprechenden Kurs teilzunehmen. Dieser Kurs bietet genügend Details, um die wesentlichen Konzepte abzudecken, ohne sich in unnötigen Längen zu verlieren. Unabhängig von Ihrem Einstiegsniveau, ob Sie Anfänger sind oder bereits fortgeschrittene Techniken suchen, dies ist die einzige Schulung, die Sie benötigen, um ChatGPT zu meistern.

Über mich:

Mein Name ist Yassine Rochd, und ich bin Gründer eines Schulungsunternehmens, das bereits Tausenden von Lernenden geholfen hat, ihre beruflichen Ziele zu erreichen.

Ich bin auch leidenschaftlich an Technologie interessiert. Nach einem Master-Abschluss in Finanzwesen und Erfahrungen in der Beratung sowie im Investmentfondsbereich, habe ich eine Ausbildung im Web-Development absolviert und Hunderte von Stunden damit verbracht, KI zu entdecken und zu nutzen.

Heute möchte ich Ihnen auf möglichst verständliche Weise das Wissen vermitteln, das ich in den letzten Jahren gesammelt habe.

Zertifizierung und Garantie:

Nach Abschluss dieses Kurses erhalten Sie ein Zertifikat, das Sie sogar auf LinkedIn teilen können.
Dieser Kurs ist zudem risikofrei, denn Sie haben eine 30-tägige „Zufriedenheitsgarantie“ mit Geld-zurück-Option.
Sie erhalten lebenslangen Zugang zum Kurs und zu den herunterladbaren Ressourcen.
Sie sind nur einen Klick davon entfernt, eine äußerst nützliche Technologie zu beherrschen, die Sie effizienter, produktiver und unverzichtbar macht.

Details zu den verschiedenen Kursabschnitten:

Schnelle Einführung in ChatGPT
Lernen Sie, wie Sie ChatGPT in nur wenigen Videos schnell beherrschen können. Tauchen Sie in die intuitive Benutzeroberfläche von ChatGPT ein und lernen Sie, Ihre ersten Prompts zu erstellen, um die volle Leistungsfähigkeit der KI auszuschöpfen. Egal, ob Sie Tabellen erstellen, brainstormen, Ideen generieren, Texte übersetzen und korrigieren oder vielfältige Inhalte verfassen möchten – mit dieser KI werden Sie schneller und leistungsfähiger. Entdecken Sie, wie ChatGPT Sie bei Ihrer Jobsuche unterstützen kann und sich an Ihre beruflichen Bedürfnisse anpasst, um Ihre Effizienz zu steigern. Sie werden sehen, dass ChatGPT in der Lage ist, eine Vielzahl von Inhalten zu erstellen, von E-Mails und Briefen bis hin zu Artikeln und Posts für soziale Netzwerke, ganz zu schweigen von der Erstellung von Programmiercode.

Grundlagen des Prompt Engineering
Erfahren Sie, warum das Prompt Engineering entscheidend ist und wie es ChatGPT in einen echten Experten verwandeln kann. Verstehen Sie die Bedeutung von Kontext und Zielen, um Ihre Interaktionen zu strukturieren, und lernen Sie, wie Sie das Format und die Parameter anpassen, um Ihre Prompts zu optimieren und das Kreativitätsniveau des Modells zu steuern. Personalisieren Sie Ihre Interaktionen, indem Sie den Ton und Stil beherrschen, und profitieren Sie von fünf praktischen Tipps, um noch relevantere Antworten von ChatGPT zu erhalten.
targetAudiences: Dieser Kurs richtet sich an alle, die KI und ChatGPT meistern möchten. Diese Schulung ist für jedes Niveau geeignet.

courseDetails.title: Executive Certificate in Business Management
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Certificate in Business Management, Leadership, Business Development, Strategy, Risks, Models
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Executive Certificate in Business Management


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 440 000 students.


Course Author:

Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Business management is the process of planning, organizing, directing, and controlling the resources (financial, human, and material) within an organization to achieve its goals and objectives effectively and efficiently. It encompasses a wide range of activities, from setting strategic direction and making operational decisions to managing resources and leading people.


Why Learning and Developing Skills in Business Management are Important for Building a Career:

  1. Versatility: Business management skills are applicable across industries and sectors. Whether you aspire to work in healthcare, technology, finance, or any other field, understanding business fundamentals will give you a strong foundation for success.

  2. Career Advancement: Professionals with strong business management skills are highly sought after for leadership and management positions. Developing these skills can open doors to career advancement opportunities and increased earning potential.

  3. Problem-Solving: Business management teaches critical thinking and problem-solving skills. You'll learn to identify challenges, analyze situations, and develop effective solutions.

  4. Communication and Collaboration: Effective communication and collaboration are essential in any business environment. Strong business managers are able to build relationships, motivate teams, and negotiate successfully.

  5. Adaptability: The business landscape is constantly evolving. Business management skills equip you to adapt to change, embrace new technologies, and navigate uncertainty.


Importance of Learning Linked Topics:

  • Business Models and Value Propositions: Understanding how businesses create, deliver, and capture value is crucial for identifying opportunities, developing new products or services, and ensuring long-term sustainability.

  • Strategic Management and Planning: This involves setting long-term goals, analyzing the competitive environment, and developing strategies to achieve success. Strong strategic thinking is essential for making informed decisions and guiding the organization towards its vision.

  • Organizational Behavior and Leadership: Effective leaders understand how to motivate and inspire teams, manage conflict, and create a positive work environment. Knowledge of organizational behavior is key to building high-performing teams and fostering a culture of innovation.

  • Risk Management and Business Continuity Planning: Businesses face a variety of risks, from financial and operational disruptions to natural disasters. Risk management involves identifying potential threats, assessing their impact, and implementing strategies to mitigate or avoid them. Business continuity planning ensures that critical operations can continue in the event of a disruption.

  • Change Management and Organizational Development: Organizations must continuously adapt to remain competitive. Change management skills are essential for leading and managing change initiatives effectively, while organizational development focuses on improving the overall performance and effectiveness of the organization.

  • Corporate Governance and Compliance: This involves ensuring that the organization operates ethically, transparently, and in accordance with relevant laws and regulations. Strong corporate governance practices build trust with stakeholders and protect the organization's reputation.

By developing a comprehensive understanding of business management and related topics, you'll gain the knowledge and skills necessary to build a successful career, make a positive impact, and contribute to the growth and development of your organization.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Professional Certificate in Regulatory Compliance by MTF Institute

By the end of this course, you will have a thorough understanding of the regulatory environment in which banking institutions operate globally and the tools needed to ensure compliance. This knowledge will empower you to navigate the complexities of regulatory compliance confidently and effectively.

In addition to these theoretical insights, you will gain practical knowledge crucial for a career in compliance area. You will be able to identify red flags as a real compliance officer, with the skills needed to detect and address potential compliance issues proactively.


Do you want to build a global career at the Wealth Management, Private Banking and Compliance?

Join our new course from globally recognized experts: Barbara Gutsch (15+ years of international experience in banking and finance, incl. 7+ years in Swiss private banking as risk and compliance manager) and Olga Margolin (17+ years in Swiss private banking industry, as top executive and business owner, managing international client relationships).


Agenda

  • Regulatory Frameworks and Compliance Standards in a Nutshell

  • Key Requirements faced by Banking Institutions

  • Why Compliance Matters? Consequences of Non-Compliance

  • Methods of Risk Mitigation and Prevention of Compliance Violations

  • Emerging Trends and Future Outlook in Regulatory Compliance


Regulatory Compliance refers to an organization's adherence to laws, regulations, guidelines, and specifications relevant to its business processes. These rules can be external (governmental, industry-specific) or internal (company policies).


Importance of Developing Regulatory Compliance Skills for Managers and Companies:

1. Risk Mitigation:

  • Legal and Financial Penalties: Non-compliance can lead to hefty fines, lawsuits, and even criminal charges for managers. By understanding regulations, managers can proactively identify potential risks and ensure compliance, thus safeguarding their companies' financial health.

  • Reputational Damage: Regulatory violations can tarnish a company's reputation, leading to loss of customer trust, decreased sales, and difficulty attracting investors. A manager skilled in compliance can prevent such scenarios.

  • Operational Disruptions: Non-compliance can lead to business interruptions or shutdowns. Managers with a strong compliance background can ensure smooth operations by implementing effective controls and procedures.


2. Strategic Advantage:

  • Competitive Edge: Companies with robust compliance programs are often viewed as more reliable and trustworthy by customers and partners. This can translate to increased business opportunities and market share.

  • Innovation: A deep understanding of regulatory landscapes can help managers identify opportunities for innovative products or services that meet emerging compliance requirements.

  • Investor Confidence: Investors are more likely to invest in companies with strong compliance records, as it demonstrates responsible management and reduces investment risk.


3. Career Advancement for Managers:

  • Increased Employability: Regulatory compliance is a sought-after skill set across industries. Managers who possess this expertise are highly valued and have a broader range of career opportunities.

  • Leadership Roles: Compliance often involves cross-functional collaboration and strategic decision-making, making it an excellent stepping stone to senior management positions.

  • Personal Growth: Staying updated on complex regulations requires continuous learning, which contributes to professional development and enhances a manager's overall skillset.


4. Ethical and Social Responsibility:

  • Protecting Consumers and Employees: Compliance with regulations ensures that products, services, and workplaces are safe for consumers and employees.

  • Sustainability: Many regulations address environmental concerns. Complying with these rules demonstrates a commitment to sustainability and corporate social responsibility.


Developing skills in regulatory compliance is not just a matter of following rules. It's about understanding the broader impact of regulations on businesses and society. By mastering this field, managers can protect their companies, advance their careers, and contribute to a safer and more sustainable business environment.

courseDetails.title: Matlab course for wireless communication engineering
courseDetails.shortDescription: A step by step the Matlab codes for BER estimations of different Comm. systems like OFDM and NOMA Comm. systems
courseDetails.longDescription:
This is course is designed for under and post graduate students associated to the electronics and communication engineering department. It has 10 introductions of 30 minutes, each introduction discusses the theoretical explanation and the simulated figures that obtained through the explanation of the course. This course saves many months of hard work.

Using the Matlab program, you will learn:

1-How to estimate the Bit-Error-Rate (BER) performance of different modulation schemes like BPSK, QPSK, 16QAM, 64QAM, and 256QAM over an Additive White Gaussian Noise (AWGN) channel?

2-How to generate and add a Rayleigh fading channel based on the Jakes model?

3-How to mitigate the Rayleigh fading channel effect using different linear equalizer schemes?

4-How to estimate the Bit-Error-Rate (BER) performance over Single-Input-Single-Output Orthogonal Frequency Division Multiplexing (SISO-OFDM) communication system over a Rayleigh fading channel?

5-How to extend this work for different Multiple-Input-Multiple-Output (MIMO) configurations like 2×2, and 3×3 MIMO-OFDM communication systems over a Rayleigh fading channel?

6-A general code for BER estimation in case of Nt×Nr configuration for OFDM communication system over a Rayleigh fading channel will be presented, where Nt, is the number of transmitting antennas, and Nr is the number of receiving antennas.

7-Finally, the BER estimation for Non-Orthogonal Multiple Access (NOMA), which used in the 5G communication systems will be presented.
targetAudiences: This is course is designed for under and postgraduate students associated with the electronics and communication engineering department

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

Course Author:

Lúcia de Fátima Silva Piedade has a Post-Doctorate in Aerospace Sciences, a PhD in Communication Sciences (organizational and crisis communication), a Master's Degree in Aeronautical Management and is an Architect. She has worked in aviation for 36 years, the last 20 as Operations Supervisor at Lisbon Airport. She is currently a lecturer at Universidade Lusófona and Universidade Atlântica.

Researcher at the Center for Research in Applied Communication, Culture and New Technologies (CICANT) and CEGIST-Center for Management Studies at Instituto Superior Técnico.


  • Postdoctorate in Aerospace Sciences

  • PhD in Communication Sciences (Organizational and Crisis Communication)

  • Master in Aeronautical Management

  • MBA in Air Transport Management /Civil Aviation

  • Architect

  • Operational Supervisor at Lisbon Airport

  • Assistant Professor at Universidade Lusófona de Humanidades e Tecnologias

  • CEGIST | Centre for Management Studies of Instituto Superior Técnico

  • CICANT | Centre for Research in Applied Communications, Culture and New Technologies

  • Global Goodwill Ambassadors Portugal - Board Director


The aviation, airline, air transportation, and airport industries form a complex and interconnected ecosystem that extends far beyond pilots, flight attendants, and air traffic controllers. A deep understanding of this ecosystem can open doors to a surprising array of career opportunities, both within and outside the industry itself.


Why Study Aviation, Airlines, Air Transportation, and Airports?

  • Understanding a Global Network: Aviation is a global industry that connects people, cultures, and economies. Learning about its operations provides insights into international business, logistics, supply chain management, and cross-cultural communication.

  • Technological Innovation: The aviation sector is at the forefront of technological advancements. Studying it exposes you to cutting-edge developments in aircraft design, navigation systems, artificial intelligence, data analytics, and sustainability initiatives.

  • Business and Management Skills: The industry offers diverse business models, from legacy airlines to low-cost carriers, airports, and maintenance providers. Studying these models enhances your understanding of strategic management, marketing, finance, and operations.

  • Regulatory and Policy Framework: Aviation is highly regulated for safety and security reasons. Understanding this framework is valuable for careers in law, policymaking, compliance, and risk management.

  • Sustainability and Environmental Impact: The industry is actively addressing its environmental footprint. Studying its sustainability efforts prepares you for careers in environmental consulting, renewable energy, and corporate social responsibility.


Who Benefits from Aviation Knowledge?

  • Engineers and Technicians: Design, maintain, and improve aircraft, airport infrastructure, and air traffic control systems.

  • Data Scientists and Analysts: Analyze passenger data, optimize flight schedules, and develop predictive models for maintenance and safety.

  • Marketing and Sales Professionals: Develop marketing campaigns, manage customer relationships, and promote aviation services.

  • Financial Analysts and Accountants: Manage budgets, analyze financial performance, and make investment decisions.

  • Legal and Compliance Professionals: Ensure regulatory compliance, draft contracts, and handle legal matters related to aviation.

  • Business Consultants: Advise airlines, airports, and other industry players on strategy, operations, and technology.


Linked Domains Where Aviation Knowledge is an Asset:

  • Tourism and Hospitality: Understand the needs of airline passengers, develop travel packages, and manage airport hotels and services.

  • Logistics and Supply Chain: Coordinate the movement of cargo, manage airport logistics, and ensure timely delivery of goods.

  • Manufacturing: Produce aircraft components, engines, and other aviation-related equipment.

  • Government and Regulatory Agencies: Develop aviation policies, enforce regulations, and promote safety and security.

  • Media and Journalism: Report on aviation news, analyze industry trends, and communicate complex information to the public.


Whether you aspire to a career directly within the aviation industry or in a related field, gaining a comprehensive understanding of aviation, airlines, air transportation, and airports is a strategic investment in your professional future. It equips you with a versatile skill set that is highly sought after in today's globalized and technology-driven economy.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at Aviation, Airlines, Air Transportation and Airports or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPTとAI: 究極のAIトレーニング
courseDetails.shortDescription: AIを極めよう：ChatGPT、Dall-e、Claude、Gemini AIの完全ガイド
courseDetails.longDescription:
ChatGPTと生成AIの究極トレーニング:

毎日の頼れるパートナー、優れた個人アシスタントと共に新しい始まりの準備はできていますか？タスクを驚異的な精度とスピードでこなすAIが、あなたのメールや記事、レポートの作成から、インスピレーションあふれる画像の生成、複雑なデータの分析、カスタムソリューションのコーディング、様々な問題の解決までをサポートします。これにより、あなたは本当に重要なことに集中することができます。


AIのすべての恩恵を享受するためには、まずAIを使いこなす必要があります。多くの人々は最初は興味を持ち、2〜3回のプロンプトを試してみるだけで、AIの真の可能性を見いだすことなく興味を失ってしまいます。その背景には、最適な結果を得るための技術や方法、設定についての知識不足があることが多いです。

このトレーニングの目的は、AIと効果的にコミュニケーションを取り、最適に設定し、最大限に活用するためのすべての鍵を提供することです。


この目標を達成するために、私はコンパクトでダイナミックなカリキュラムを設計しました。このカリキュラムでは、AIの最適な利用法に必要な知識とスキルを習得できます。トレーニングでは以下のことを学びます：

  • AIに明確なリクエストを行い、最良の回答を得る方法

  • ChatGPTを信頼できる教師、共同創設者、アナリストに設定する方法

  • 多様なアイデアを生成し、仕事の質を向上させ、生産性を高め、より速く、より適切かつ効率的にする方法

  • ChatGPTのマルチモーダル機能を活用し、テキストや音声での対話、画像の送信と解釈を行う方法

  • Dall-eやCopilotを使って最良の画像を生成する方法

  • ChatGPTの有料版の代替案を見つける方法

  • Copilot、Claude、Geminiなど他のAIを探索する

  • ChatGPTを自分の好みや特定のニーズに合わせてカスタマイズし、個別の回答を得る方法

  • GPTsを利用してChatGPTを強化する方法：これらのアプリケーションの使い方や、開発者でなくても作成する方法

  • API管理、プレイグラウンド、ExcelやGoogle Sheetsなど他のソフトウェアとの統合など、少し技術的なトピックをトレーニングの最後に扱う

そして、これらすべてが初心者でもアクセス可能であることを確認します。


このトレーニングには以下が含まれます：

  • 実践的なデモンストレーション

  • ダウンロード可能な技術資料や実践ガイド

  • そして何より、定期的に更新されるコンテンツ


[更新情報：GPT4の次世代モデルであるGPT4oの使用に関する動画を追加しました]

要約すると、あなたは明確でアクセスしやすく、魅力的なコースを受講しようとしています。このコースは基本概念を網羅しながらも冗長ではなく、詳細な内容です。初心者から高度なテクニックを求める方まで、ChatGPTをマスターするために必要な唯一のトレーニングです。

自己紹介：

私はヤシン・ロシュドと申します。多くの学習者がプロフェッショナルな目標を達成するのを支援してきたトレーニング機関の創設者です。

私はテクノロジーに情熱を持っています。金融の修士号を取得し、コンサルティングや投資ファンドでの経験を経た後、ウェブ開発のトレーニングを受け、数百時間にわたってAIの発見と使用に取り組んできました。

今日は、過去数年間で学んだことをできるだけ分かりやすくお伝えしたいと思います。


認定と保証：

  • このトレーニングを修了すると、LinkedInでも共有できる認定証を受け取ることができます。

  • このトレーニングはリスクフリーで、30日間の「満足保証」付きです。

  • トレーニング、ダウンロード可能なリソース、将来の更新に生涯アクセスできます。

非常に役立つ技術をマスターし、より効率的で生産的になり、欠かせない存在になるための一歩が、今ここにあります。


コースの各セクションの詳細:


ChatGPTのクイックスタート

数本のビデオでChatGPTをすばやく習得する方法を学びます。直感的なインターフェイスに飛び込み、最初のプロンプトを作成してAIの力を最大限に活用しましょう。テーブルの生成、ブレインストーミング、アイデアの生成、テキストの翻訳と校正、さまざまなコンテンツの作成など、AIを使えば迅速かつ効果的に作業が進みます。ChatGPTがあなたの就職活動を支援し、プロフェッショナルなニーズに合わせて効率を高める方法を発見しましょう。メールや手紙から記事、ソーシャルメディアの投稿、プログラミングコードの作成まで、多様なコンテンツを生成する能力を持つChatGPTを活用する方法を学びます。


プロンプトエンジニアリングの基礎

なぜプロンプトエンジニアリングが重要なのか、その理由を学び、ChatGPTを真の専門家に変える方法を理解します。コンテキストと目標の重要性を理解し、インタラクションを構造化する方法、フォーマットと温度を調整してプロンプトを最適化し、モデルの創造性のレベルを変える方法を発見します。トーンとスタイルをマスターしてインタラクションをパーソナライズし、より適切な回答を得るための5つの実用的なヒントを提供します。


プロンプトエンジニアリングの高度な技術

このセクションでは、他のプロンプトを生成するプロンプトを作成する方法を学びます。リバースエンジニアリングの手法、ウェブ検索機能、画像の解釈など、さまざまな高度な技術を学びます。


Dall-e

Dall-eを使った画像生成について学びます。平均的な結果から美的でインスピレーションを与える作品に変える方法、画像の部分を簡単かつ迅速に修正する方法、結果を最適化する方法を学びます。フィクションや漫画のキャラクターの生成を連続性を持って行う技術など、高度なテクニックも学び、より印象的な結果を得る方法を学びます。


ChatGPTとAIの限界に対するソリューション

ChatGPTや他のAIモデルには限界や弱点があります。このセクションでは、それらが何であるか、そしてそれを克服する方法を学びます。


ChatGPTの興味深い機能

チャットの共有機能を設定してChatGPTを共同利用する方法を学びます。ChatGPTのモバイルアプリを最大限に活用し、そのすべてのオプションを探ります。最後に、AIを使用して独自のコンテンツを作成し、盗用や重複コンテンツを避ける方法を学びます。


CopilotとBing

CopilotはChatGPTの有料機能や高度な機能に対する興味深い代替案を提供します。MicrosoftとOpenAIの提携を活用して、Bing検索エンジンに統合された高度なAI機能にアクセスする方法を学びます。


Gemini、Claude、Mistral、その他

前のセクションに続き、GoogleのGeminiやAnthropicのClaudeなど、他のAIを調査します。それらの強みと弱みを理解し、ChatGPTよりも優先して使用するケーススタディを検討します。


ChatGPTのカスタム指示

ChatGPTをあなたのニーズや期待に合わせてカスタマイズする方法を学びます。カスタム指示を設定してインタラクションをパーソナライズし、最適な使用のために考慮すべき注意点を発見します。


GPTs

GPTsの仕組みを学びます。これらの専門的なミニアプリケーションは、時にはChatGPTを超えることがあります。ステップバイステップで独自のGPTを作成する方法を学びます。ChatGPTの能力を最大限に引き出すためのAPIコールをマスターし、最終的にはGPTを収益化する方法や、ChatGPTを活用してお金を稼ぐ方法も学びます。


API管理とプレイグラウンド

ChatGPTのプレイグラウンドを探索し、新機能を発見します。段階的に難易度を上げてChatGPTのAPIを呼び出す方法を学びます。これにより、ChatGPTをインターフェース外で使用したり、別のサイトにチャットボットを作成したり、Google SheetsやExcelなどの他のソフトウェアに統合したりすることができます。
targetAudiences: AIとChatGPTをマスターしたいすべての人に。このトレーニングはすべてのレベルに対応しています。

courseDetails.shortDescription: Decision Making for Leaders and Managers Course by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Decision Making for Leaders and Managers


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 450 000 students.


Course Author:

Dr. Pedro Nunes has built a multifaceted career combining academia and practical business expertise. His educational journey culminated with a Doctorate in Economic Analysis and Business Strategy with a cum laude mention from the University of Santiago de Compostela. Professionally, he has navigated through various sectors, including technology, international commerce, and consultancy, with roles ranging from business analyst to director. Currently, Pedro serves as a Professor in several DBA programs, applying his extensive industry experience and academic insights to educate the next generation of professionals.


The Decision-Making Process is a systematic approach to identifying and evaluating options, leading to informed choices. It's a structured framework that helps individuals and organizations tackle complex problems and make decisions that align with their goals and values.


Why is the Decision-Making Process Important for Business?

  • Informed Choices: It reduces the risk of making impulsive or uninformed decisions, leading to better outcomes.

  • Resource Optimization: By carefully considering alternatives, businesses can allocate resources more effectively.

  • Risk Management: It enables the identification and mitigation of potential risks associated with each option.

  • Efficiency: A streamlined process saves time and ensures that decisions are made promptly.

  • Accountability: It provides a clear rationale for decisions, making it easier to justify them and learn from mistakes.

  • Adaptability: Businesses can respond to changing circumstances more effectively when they have a structured process in place.


Importance for Leaders and Managers

  • Strategic Direction: Leaders can use the process to shape the overall direction of the organization.

  • Problem-Solving: Managers can address operational issues and challenges systematically.

  • Team Engagement: Involving team members in the process fosters collaboration and buy-in.

  • Leadership Development: Making sound decisions builds credibility and confidence in leaders.

  • Conflict Resolution: The process can help resolve disagreements by providing a neutral framework.


How Decision-Making Skills Support Career Building

  • Employability: Decision-making skills are highly valued by employers across various industries.

  • Advancement: Individuals who demonstrate strong decision-making abilities are often promoted to leadership roles.

  • Problem-Solver Reputation: People known for making good decisions become go-to resources for their teams.

  • Adaptability: Those with honed decision-making skills can navigate changing job markets and career paths.

  • Confidence: Making sound decisions consistently builds self-assurance and resilience.


Steps in the Decision-Making Process:

  1. Identify the Problem: Clearly define the issue or decision that needs to be addressed.

  2. Gather Information: Collect relevant data and facts related to the problem.

  3. Identify Alternatives: Generate a list of possible solutions or courses of action.

  4. Evaluate Alternatives: Assess the pros and cons of each option, considering their potential impact.

  5. Choose the Best Alternative: Select the option that best aligns with your goals and values.

  6. Implement the Decision: Put the chosen solution into action.

  7. Review and Evaluate: Monitor the results of your decision and make adjustments as needed.


By mastering the decision-making process, individuals and businesses can make more confident, informed choices that lead to success and growth.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in management and business

Agenda

  • Opening of an Account in a Bank or Client Onboarding Process


Do you want to build a global career at the Wealth Management, Private Banking and Compliance?

Join our course from globally recognized experts: Barbara Gutsch (15+ years of international experience in banking and finance, incl. 7+ years in Swiss private banking as risk and compliance manager) and Olga Margolin (17+ years in Swiss private banking industry, as top executive and business owner, managing international client relationships).


Global Wealth Management and Private Banking (GWMPB) are specialized financial services catering to high-net-worth individuals (HNWIs) and ultra-high-net-worth individuals (UHNWIs). These services extend beyond traditional banking and encompass a comprehensive suite of financial solutions tailored to the unique needs and objectives of affluent clients.

Global Wealth Management focuses on managing and growing the wealth of HNWIs through a diverse range of investment strategies, including portfolio management, asset allocation, risk management, and financial planning. This holistic approach aims to preserve and enhance clients' wealth over the long term while addressing their specific financial goals, such as retirement planning, estate planning, and tax optimization.

Private Banking offers personalized banking services to HNWIs and UHNWIs. These services include bespoke banking solutions, exclusive investment opportunities, concierge services, and access to a dedicated relationship manager who understands their unique financial circumstances and aspirations. Private banks often act as trusted advisors, guiding clients through complex financial matters and providing tailored solutions to meet their evolving needs.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at Finance or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & AI : 인공지능 완벽 교육
courseDetails.shortDescription: AI 마스터 클래스 : ChatGPT, DALL-E, Claude, Gemini - 인공지능에 대한 완벽 가이드
courseDetails.longDescription:
ChatGPT & 생성형 AI 완벽 교육

매일 아침, 탁월한 능력을 지닌 개인 비서이자 동반자로서, 정확하고 신속하게 당신의 작업을 수행할 준비가 된 AI와 함께 하루를 시작할 준비가 되셨나요? 이메일 작성, 기사 작성, 보고서 작성, 영감을 주는 이미지 생성, 복잡한 데이터 분석, 맞춤형 솔루션 코딩 및 다양한 문제 해결을 통해 진정으로 중요한 일에 집중할 수 있도록 돕는 AI 말입니다.

이러한 혜택을 누리기 위해서는 AI를 제대로 이해하고 마스터해야 합니다. 많은 사람들이 인공지능에 관심을 갖고 몇 가지 프롬프트를 시도하지만, 결국 인공지능의 진정한 잠재력을 발견하지 못하고 포기하는 경우가 많습니다. 이러한 결과는 AI로부터 최상의 결과를 얻기 위한 기술, 방법, 설정에 대한 지식이 부족하기 때문입니다.

따라서 이 교육의 목적은 AI와 효과적으로 소통하고, 최적의 설정을 통해 AI를 최대한 활용할 수 있는 모든 열쇠를 제공하는 것입니다.

이를 위해 필수 지식과 기술을 개발할 수 있는 간결하고 역동적인 교육 과정을 설계했습니다.

이 과정에서 우리는 다음을 함께 배울 것입니다:

  • AI에게 명확한 요청을 하여 최상의 답변을 얻는 방법

  • ChatGPT를 신뢰할 수 있는 교사, 공동 창작자 또는 분석가로 설정하는 방법

  • 다수의 아이디어를 생성하고, 업무에서 더 나은 성과를 내며, 더 생산적이고 빠르고 효율적으로 일하는 방법

  • ChatGPT의 멀티모달 기능을 최대한 활용하여 텍스트 입력, 음성 대화, 이미지 전송 및 해석을 요청하는 방법

  • DALL-E나 Copilot을 통해 최상의 이미지를 생성하는 방법

  • ChatGPT의 유료 버전에 대한 흥미로운 대안을 찾는 방법

  • Copilot, Claude, Gemini와 같은 다른 AI를 탐색하는 방법

  • ChatGPT를 개인의 선호도와 필요에 맞게 조정하여 맞춤형 응답을 얻는 방법

  • GPTs로 ChatGPT를 향상시키는 방법: 이러한 애플리케이션을 사용하는 방법과 개발자가 아니더라도 이를 만드는 방법

  • 교육 후반부에서는 API 관리, Playground, Excel이나 Google Sheets와 같은 다른 소프트웨어에 ChatGPT를 통합하는 등 더 기술적인 주제를 다룰 것입니다.

그리고 초보자도 쉽게 접근할 수 있다는 점을 알게 될 것입니다.

이 교육 과정에는 다음이 포함됩니다:

  • 구체적인 시연

  • 다운로드 가능한 기술 자료 및 실용 가이드

  • 정기적으로 업데이트되는 콘텐츠


[업데이트: GPT-4의 후속 모델인 GPT-4o 사용법에 대한 영상을 추가했습니다]


간단히 말해, 명확하고 접근 가능하며 흥미로운 강의를 듣게 될 것입니다. 필수 개념을 다루기에 충분하면서도 길지 않은 강의입니다. 초보자든 고급 기술을 찾는 분이든 상관없이, ChatGPT를 마스터하기 위해 필요한 유일한 교육입니다.


제 소개:

제 이름은 야신 로슈드입니다. 저는 수천 명의 학습자가 그들의 직업적 목표를 달성할 수 있도록 돕는 교육 기관의 창립자입니다.

저는 기술에 열정을 가지고 있습니다. 금융학 석사 학위와 컨설팅 및 투자 펀드에서의 경험을 바탕으로, 웹 개발 교육을 받고 수백 시간을 들여 다양한 AI를 탐구하고 사용했습니다.

오늘, 제가 지난 몇 년 동안 배운 것을 최대한 명확하게 전달하고자 합니다.


인증 및 보장:

  • 이 교육을 완료하면 LinkedIn에 공유할 수 있는 인증서를 받게 됩니다.

  • 또한 이 교육 과정은 30일 환불 보장으로 안심하고 참여할 수 있습니다.


당신을 더 효율적이고, 더 생산적이며, 없어서는 안 될 기술로 무장하게 해 줄 기술을 마스터하기 위한 한 클릭이 남았습니다.


이 과정의 각 섹션 세부 사항


ChatGPT 빠른 시작
몇 개의 비디오만으로 ChatGPT를 신속하게 마스터하는 방법을 배워보세요. ChatGPT의 직관적인 인터페이스에 익숙해지고, 첫 프롬프트를 생성하여 AI의 강력한 기능을 최대한 활용하는 방법을 배워보세요. 표 생성, 브레인스토밍, 아이디어 창출, 텍스트 번역 및 수정, 다양한 콘텐츠 작성 등 ChatGPT와 함께라면 더 빠르고 효율적으로 작업할 수 있습니다. ChatGPT를 활용하여 구직 활동을 지원받고, 직업적 필요에 맞게 맞춤형으로 활용하여 효율성을 높이는 방법도 알아보세요. 이메일, 편지, 기사, 소셜 미디어 게시물, 그리고 코드 작성까지 다양한 콘텐츠를 생성할 수 있는 ChatGPT의 능력을 확인해보세요.


프롬프트 엔지니어링 기초
프롬프트 엔지니어링이 왜 중요한지, 그리고 어떻게 ChatGPT를 진정한 전문가로 변모시킬 수 있는지 배워보세요. 맥락과 목표의 중요성을 이해하고, 상호작용을 구조화하는 방법을 배우며, 프롬프트의 형식과 온도를 조절하여 모델의 창의성 수준을 최적화하는 방법을 알아보세요. 톤과 스타일을 마스터하여 상호작용을 개인화하고, ChatGPT로부터 더 적절한 답변을 얻기 위한 5가지 실용적인 팁을 제공합니다.


프롬프트 엔지니어링 고급 기술
이 섹션에서는 프롬프트를 생성하는 프롬프트를 만드는 방법을 배웁니다. 역공학 방법, 웹 검색 기능, 이미지 해석 기능 등 다양한 고급 기술을 학습합니다.


DALL-E
DALL-E를 사용하여 이미지 생성에 대해 알아보세요. 평균적인 결과에서 아름답고 영감을 주는 작품으로 전환하는 방법, 이미지의 일부를 간단하고 빠르게 수정하는 방법, 그리고 결과를 최적화하는 방법을 배웁니다. 또한, 소설이나 만화 캐릭터 생성에 연속성을 부여하여 더 인상적인 결과를 얻는 고급 기술도 다룹니다.


ChatGPT 및 AI의 한계 해결책
ChatGPT 및 기타 인공지능 모델은 한계와 약점을 가지고 있습니다. 이 섹션에서는 이러한 한계가 무엇인지, 그리고 이를 어떻게 극복할 수 있는지 알아봅니다.


ChatGPT의 흥미로운 기능
ChatGPT를 협업용으로 사용하기 위해 대화 공유 기능을 설정하는 방법을 배웁니다. ChatGPT 모바일 애플리케이션의 모든 옵션을 탐색하여 최대한 활용하는 방법을 배우고, AI를 통해 플래그 없이 독창적인 콘텐츠를 만드는 방법도 알아봅니다.


Copilot 및 Bing
Copilot은 ChatGPT의 유료 고급 기능에 대한 여러 가지 흥미로운 대안을 제공합니다. Microsoft와 OpenAI의 파트너십을 활용하여 Bing 검색 엔진에 통합된 고급 인공지능 기능을 사용하는 방법을 배워보세요.


Gemini, Claude, Mistral 등
이전 섹션의 연장선으로, Google의 Gemini 또는 Anthropic의 Claude와 같은 다른 AI를 살펴봅니다. 이들의 강점과 약점을 파악하고, 어떤 상황에서 ChatGPT 대신 사용하는 것이 더 나은지 알아보세요.


ChatGPT 커스텀 설정
ChatGPT를 필요와 기대에 맞게 조정하세요. 커스텀 설정을 구성하여 상호작용을 개인화하는 방법을 배우고, 최적의 사용을 위해 고려해야 할 주의사항을 알아봅니다.


GPTs
GPTs의 작동 방식을 배우고, 때로는 ChatGPT를 능가할 수 있는 이 초특화된 미니 애플리케이션을 알아보세요. 단계별로 자신의 GPT를 만드는 방법을 배우고, ChatGPT의 기능을 극대화하기 위해 API 호출을 마스터하세요. 또한, 이 섹션의 마지막에서는 GPT를 통해 수익을 창출하는 방법과 더 넓게는 ChatGPT로 돈을 버는 방법을 탐구합니다.


API 관리 및 Playground
ChatGPT의 Playground를 탐색하고 제공되는 새로운 기능을 알아보세요. 단계별로 ChatGPT의 API를 호출하는 방법을 배워, 인터페이스 외부에서 ChatGPT를 사용하거나, 다른 사이트에 챗봇을 만들거나, Google Sheets 또는 Excel과 같은 소프트웨어에 ChatGPT를 통합할 수 있습니다.
targetAudiences: 인공지능과 ChatGPT를 마스터하고자 하는 모든 분들을 위한 과정입니다. 이 교육은 모든 수준에 적합합니다.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Professional Certificate, Introduction to Management, Managing in Organizations, Leadership, Planning, Decision Making
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Professional Certificate in Management


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 210 countries and has been chosen by more than 520 000 students.


Course Author:

Dr. Pedro Nunes has built a multifaceted career combining academia and practical business expertise. His educational journey culminated with a Doctorate in Economic Analysis and Business Strategy with a cum laude mention from the University of Santiago de Compostela. Professionally, he has navigated through various sectors, including technology, international commerce, and consultancy, with roles ranging from business analyst to director. Currently, Pedro serves as a Professor in several DBA programs, applying his extensive industry experience and academic insights to educate the next generation of professionals.


Topic Description:

Management is the process of coordinating and overseeing the activities of an organization to achieve its goals.

It involves planning, organizing, leading, and controlling resources, including human, financial, and material, to ensure efficient and effective operations.


Key Elements of Management:

Planning: Setting objectives and determining the best course of action to achieve them.

Organizing: Arranging resources and tasks in a structured manner to accomplish the goals.

Leading: Directing and motivating people to work towards the organization's objectives.

Controlling: Monitoring and evaluating progress to ensure that the goals are met.


Importance of Management:

Achievement of Goals: Management helps organizations set and achieve their objectives, ensuring that all activities are aligned with the desired outcomes.

Resource Optimization: Efficient management ensures that resources are used effectively, minimizing waste and maximizing productivity.

Adaptability and Innovation: Good management practices enable organizations to adapt to changing environments and foster innovation.

Employee Motivation and Development: Effective management involves leading and motivating employees, which enhances job satisfaction and personal growth.

Competitive Advantage: Strong management practices give organizations a competitive edge by improving efficiency, productivity, and overall performance.


About Management

Management is the process of planning, organizing, leading, and controlling resources (human, financial, material, information) to achieve organizational goals efficiently and effectively. It involves setting objectives, making decisions, coordinating activities, motivating people, and monitoring progress.


Importance of Building Skills in Management for Career and Business:

  1. Career Advancement: Strong management skills are highly valued by employers, leading to career advancement opportunities. Effective managers can take on greater responsibilities, lead teams, and make strategic decisions, opening doors to higher positions and salaries.

  2. Leadership Development: Management skills cultivate leadership qualities. By learning to motivate and inspire others, communicate effectively, and resolve conflicts, you can become a more influential and impactful leader, capable of guiding teams and driving success.

  3. Enhanced Performance: Management skills improve individual and team performance. By setting clear goals, delegating tasks effectively, and providing constructive feedback, you can optimize productivity and achieve better results.

  4. Problem-Solving and Decision-Making: Management equips you with critical thinking and problem-solving skills. You'll learn to analyze situations, identify root causes, and make informed decisions, even under pressure.

  5. Adaptability: Management skills foster adaptability to change. You'll develop the ability to navigate dynamic environments, anticipate challenges, and implement solutions, ensuring success in an ever-evolving business landscape.


Importance for Building Your Own Business:

  1. Effective Planning and Organization: Management skills enable you to develop a comprehensive business plan, set clear objectives, and allocate resources efficiently, laying a solid foundation for your venture.

  2. Team Building and Leadership: You'll be able to attract, motivate, and retain top talent, creating a cohesive and high-performing team dedicated to your vision.

  3. Financial Management: Sound management skills help you manage cash flow, make informed financial decisions, and ensure the financial sustainability of your business.

  4. Risk Management: You'll be better equipped to identify and mitigate potential risks, proactively addressing challenges and protecting your investment.

  5. Customer Focus: Management fosters a customer-centric approach, helping you understand and meet customer needs, build strong relationships, and drive customer satisfaction.


Building skills in management is a valuable investment for both career advancement and entrepreneurial success. By honing these skills, you'll be better prepared to lead teams, achieve goals, and build a thriving business.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: [TR] Tariften Şefe: 100+ Projeyle LLM Mühendisi Olun
courseDetails.shortDescription: Kod yazmadan LLM ustası olun! Yapay zekayı eğlenceli yemek benzetmeleriyle öğrenin. (AI)
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bu kurs, yapay zeka tarafından İngilizceden Türkçeye çevrilmiştir, böylece son teknolojileri kendi ana dilinizde öğrenebilirsiniz.

Tariften Şefe: LLM Mühendisi Ol (Yemek Benzetmeleriyle), hiç kod yazmadan Büyük Dil Modellerini (LLM'ler) öğrenebileceğiniz eğlenceli ve başlangıç dostu bir kurstur. Yapay zekaya ilgi duyuyorsanız, dil modellerinin dünyasına adım atmak istiyorsanız ya da bir LLM mühendisi olmak hedefindeyseniz, bu kurs sizi ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini ve LLaMA gibi güçlü araçları anlamaya ve kullanmaya hazırlayacak. Teknik kavramları mutfak metaforlarıyla basitleştiriyoruz—böylece sıfırdan bir yapay zeka şefine dönüşmeniz hiç zaman almayacak.

LLM’lerin nasıl inşa edildiğini, eğitildiğini, dağıtıldığını ve değerlendirildiğini kolay anlaşılır benzetmelerle keşfedeceksiniz. Tokenizasyonu sebze doğramaya, eğitimi büyük ölçekli fırınlamaya, prompt mühendisliğini ise yemeği doğru şekilde tatlandırmaya benzetiyoruz. Her modül veri hazırlama ve ince ayardan değerlendirme ve dağıtıma kadar yeni bir beceri kazandırmak için tasarlandı. Kurs sonunda, model mimarisi, ön eğitim, transfer öğrenimi, prompt optimizasyonu, perplexity ve BLEU gibi metriklerle model değerlendirme ve FastAPI, Gradio, Hugging Face Spaces ve LangChain gibi araçlarla kendi LLM tabanlı uygulamalarınızı dağıtma konularında yetkinlik kazanacaksınız.

Bu kurs, teknik altyapısı olmayan öğrenciler, eğitmenler, içerik üreticileri, girişimciler ve profesyoneller için idealdir. Yapay zeka yaşam döngüsünü adım adım keşfedeceksiniz—“Dil modeli nedir?” sorusundan başlayarak kendi chatbot’unuzu, özetleyicinizi veya öneri uygulamanızı dağıtmaya kadar. Kod yazmadan çalışan araçları nasıl kullanacağınızı, gerçek prompt’larla nasıl denemeler yapacağınızı, var olan modelleri nasıl iyileştireceğinizi, çıktıları nasıl değerlendireceğinizi ve prompt mühendisi, yapay zeka ürün yöneticisi veya LLM mimarı gibi kariyer yollarını nasıl keşfedeceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.

Kodlama deneyimi gerekmez. LLM’lerle doğal dil kullanarak nasıl iletişim kuracağınızı, akıllı ve etkili prompt’lar nasıl tasarlanacağını, veri toplama ve tokenizasyondan modelin tahmin sürecine ve GPU/TPU gibi donanım ihtiyaçlarına kadar perde arkasında neler olduğunu öğreneceksiniz. Ayrıca, önyargı tespiti, halüsinasyonlar, geri bildirim döngüleri ve zaman içinde yapay zeka sistemlerinizi izleme ve geliştirme stratejilerini de ele alacağız.

Kursun sonunda LLM teorisinde sağlam bir temele, uygulamalı AI projelerinden oluşan bir portföye ve üretken yapay zekanın büyüyen dünyasında yer almak için gerekli özgüvene sahip olacaksınız. Kendi AI ürününüzü oluşturmak, bir startup'a katılmak, açık kaynak projelere katkı sağlamak veya sadece arkadaşlarınıza makine öğrenimini açıklayabilmek istiyorsanız, bu kurs sizi oraya taşıyacak—bilgiyle dolu bir tabak ve yanında eğlenceli bir sunumla.

Eğer tarif okuyucusundan LLM şefine dönüşmeye hazırsanız, mutfak benzetmeleri ve pratik örneklerle dolu bu lezzetli yapay zeka yolculuğuna katılın!
targetAudiences: Teknik terimlere boğulmadan yapay zeka dünyasına adım atmak isteyen yeni başlayanlar.
Yapay zeka destekli araçları keşfeden ürün yöneticileri ve iş liderleri.
LLM’lerden yararlanmak isteyen eğitimciler, içerik üreticileri ve hikaye anlatıcıları.
LLM mühendisi, istem tasarımcısı veya yapay zeka uzmanı olmayı hedefleyen kariyer değiştiriciler.
Gerçek hayattan alınan benzetmelerle (örneğin yemek!), etkileşimli projelerle ve uygulamalı yaratıcılıkla öğrenmeyi seviyorsanız, bu kursu lezzetli derecede değerli bulacaksınız.

courseDetails.title: Adobe After Effect Essential: Learn Video Motion Animation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master the Art of Video Motion Animation with Adobe After Effects
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Adobe After Effects Essentials: Learn Video Motion Animation! This comprehensive Udemy course is designed to provide you with a solid foundation in creating captivating video motion animations using Adobe After Effects.

Whether you're a beginner or have some experience with After Effects, this course will take you on a step-by-step journey to master the essential techniques and tools required to create stunning motion graphics. By the end of the course, you'll have the skills to bring your ideas to life and create professional-quality animations for a wide range of purposes, including commercials, explainer videos, title sequences, and more.

Here's a glimpse of what you'll learn:

  1. Introduction to After Effects: Familiarize yourself with the software's interface, layout, and essential features.

  2. Animation Fundamentals: Explore the core principles of animation, including timing, spacing, easing, and keyframes.

  3. Working with Layers and Masks: Learn how to effectively organize and manipulate layers, apply masks for precise control, and utilize blending modes to enhance your animations.

  4. Transforming and Animating Objects: Discover various techniques to transform and animate objects, including position, scale, rotation, opacity, and more.

  5. Creating Motion Graphics: Dive into the world of motion graphics and learn how to design and animate elements such as text, shapes, and icons.

  6. Working with Effects and Presets: Harness the power of After Effects' extensive library of effects and presets to add visual enhancements and stylize your animations.

  7. Introduction to Expressions: Get introduced to expressions, a powerful feature in After Effects, and learn how to use them to automate and streamline your animations.

  8. Advanced Techniques: Explore advanced topics such as 3D animation, camera tracking, motion tracking, and green screen compositing.

  9. Rendering and Exporting: Understand the process of rendering your animations and exporting them in various formats for different platforms and devices.

Throughout the course, you'll have hands-on exercises and practical projects to reinforce your learning. You'll also gain valuable tips, tricks, and workflow techniques from industry professionals to elevate the quality of your animations.

Whether you're a videographer, motion graphic designer, marketer, or anyone interested in creating visually stunning animations, this Adobe After Effects Essentials course will equip you with the skills and confidence to bring your creative visions to life. Enroll now and start mastering the art of video motion animation with Adobe After Effects!

courseDetails.shortDescription: MongoDB Complete Developers Tutorial Easy to Learn
courseDetails.longDescription:
"MongoDB - The Complete MongoDB Developer's Course" is a comprehensive online course designed to equip developers with the skills and knowledge needed to become proficient in MongoDB, a leading NoSQL database solution. This course covers essential concepts, practical techniques, and advanced strategies for leveraging MongoDB effectively in application development.


The course begins with an overview of MongoDB, introducing its architecture, data model, and advantages over traditional relational databases. Participants learn how MongoDB's document-oriented approach enables flexible data management and efficient query processing.


As the course progresses, participants dive into MongoDB's core operations, including CRUD operations, indexing, aggregation, and data modeling. Through coding examples, students gain practical experience in performing common database tasks and optimizing query performance.


In addition to covering fundamental concepts, the course explores advanced topics such as replication, sharding, and high availability. Participants learn how to design and deploy scalable MongoDB clusters to meet the demands of large scale applications.


Furthermore, the course addresses security considerations, performance optimization strategies, and best practices for integrating MongoDB with popular programming languages and frameworks. Participants gain insights into securing data, improving application performance, and streamlining development workflows.


By the end of the course, participants will have acquired a deep understanding of MongoDB's features and capabilities, enabling them to build robust, scalable, and high performance applications using this powerful NoSQL database.
targetAudiences: This Course is For Anyone Learning MongoDB
